original: mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag /

analyzed: shri he ru ka'i rigs las byung //

original: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir //

analyzed: mtshan nyid yang dag bshad pa yin // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: The characteristics are explained correctly.🔽This concludes the chapter on the characteristics of the dakinis, the fortieth

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o ////
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o ////

analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba // sgrub pa po yis l'a ma yi //
translated: Now, I will explain🔽The characteristics of the mudra🔽Of the practitioner,

analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par dang // yan lag tshogs ni shes par bya'o //

original: gang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: gang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni //

original: kun tu zlum por snang 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: kun tu zlum por snang 'gyur zhing //

analyzed: kha yi smra ra rtag tu yod; ;spu dang smin ma ring ba dang // gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang // mi 'khrug ba den par smra ba dang // rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'//

original: dpa' bo'i sring mor de @264a *//
analyzed: dpa' bo'i sring mor de @264a *//

analyzed: shes bya // padma'i phyag rgyar sbyin bya ba //

original: yang na rus spal phyag rgya bya //
analyzed: yang na rus spal phyag rgya bya //

original: pags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid //
analyzed: pags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid //

analyzed: phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya //

analyzed: de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la //

analyzed: khyim du padma 'bri bar 'gyur // l'a ma yi ni bud med kyi //
translated: one should draw a lotus in the house.🔽These are the characteristics of the woman

analyzed: mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin //

analyzed: gsus pa rlo zhing mig dkyus ring //

analyzed: mig ni dmar zhing ser skyar gnas //

analyzed: phyug cing skal bzang dpal yon tan //

analyzed: ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang //

original: dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing //
analyzed: dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing //

analyzed: mtshams kyi gyen du bltas pa nas //

analyzed: rgod cing dga' pa nyid dag dang // lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas // g-yul du 'chi ba rnams kyi ni //

analyzed: gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'//

analyzed: de lta'i rab dregs mthong na ni // mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya; ;rkang pa g-yon pa bskum pa yi //

analyzed: bdag nyid kyang ni bstan par bya //

original: g-yon pa dag ni yongs ldog pa //
analyzed: g-yon pa dag ni yongs ldog pa //

analyzed: de ni dus tshigs yin par bshad //

analyzed: khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang //

analyzed: bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod // 'jig rten dbang phyug l'a ma yi //

analyzed: @264b mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin //

analyzed: gang gi mkhur tshos dag tu ni // khung bur snang ba gnas gyur cing //

analyzed: 'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni //

analyzed: mtshan nyid gyur ba de dag yin //

analyzed: lus kun la ni ba spu yod //

analyzed: mdud gi phyag rgya bstan par bya // g-yon nas yongs su ldog pa ni //
translated: with effort.🔽The reply of the seal is explained to be

analyzed: l'a ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o ////

analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

analyzed: gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni //

analyzed: gang zhig pus mo la reg pa //

analyzed: gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni //

analyzed: gang zhig num ma la reg pa //

analyzed: gang zhig @266a *//

analyzed: de ltar bya zhes smra ba yin //

analyzed: gang zhig tshigs la reg byed pa //
translated: If [the messenger] touches her knee,

analyzed: bde bar nyal zhes smra ba yin //

analyzed: de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi //

analyzed: mtshan nyid de yis bshad par bya //

analyzed: gang zhig lto ba ston byed pa //

translated: even if far away, one will know.🔽There is no union other than with Heruka.

original: he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med; ;slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni //
analyzed: he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med; ;slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni //
translated: The master is a yoginī herself

original: rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa 'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa 'o //
translated: and is accomplished in this tantra.

original: legs par gyur pa nyid yin te //
analyzed: legs par gyur pa nyid yin te //
translated: She is one who has become excellent

original: brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya //
analyzed: brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya //
translated: and should not be despised or abandoned.

original: nus pa yis ni mchod par bya; ;pho nya mo brgyad 'di dag ni //
analyzed: nus pa yis ni mchod par bya; ;pho nya mo brgyad 'di dag ni //
translated: One should worship with the power of the eight messengers.

original: mos dang dad pa 'phal byed pa //
analyzed: mos dang dad pa 'phal byed pa //
translated: They are the ones who increase devotion and faith,

original: rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu //
analyzed: rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu //
translated: And are always the cause of accomplishments.

original: dam tshig rnams kyang skyong ba 'o //
analyzed: dam tshig rnams kyang skyong ba 'o //
translated: They also protect the commitments.

original: lha mo gzhan dag @269a *//
analyzed: lha mo gzhan dag @269a *//
translated: The other goddesses

original: kun sbyor ba'i //
analyzed: kun sbyor ba'i //
translated: Are engaged in the union of desire.🔽The one who is ignorant of desire, the nondual, the unobstructed,

original: 'dod la rmongs par gyur pa dang // gnyis su med dang thogs med dang // dam tshig spyad par spyod pa dang // bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor //
analyzed: 'dod la rmongs par gyur pa dang // gnyis su med dang thogs med dang // dam tshig spyad par spyod pa dang // bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor //
translated: The one who practices the conduct of commitments, the powerful woman, and the one who is very engaged,

original: tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin gzhi //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin gzhi //
translated: The one who is celibate, and the one who is based on that,

original: khro med rgyun gyi kun tu spyod //
analyzed: khro med rgyun gyi kun tu spyod //
translated: The one who is without anger, and the one who always practices—

original: 'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin //
analyzed: 'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin //
translated: These eight are the conduct of all commitments.

original: sgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi; ;sgrub pa po yis rtag shes bya //
analyzed: sgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi; ;sgrub pa po yis rtag shes bya //
translated: The adept should always know them

original: rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste //
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste //
translated: As being common to all tantras.🔽One should not destroy the root,

original: rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya //
analyzed: rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya //
translated: Which is without cause.

original: dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi //
analyzed: dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi //
translated: One should take up the commitments through faith alone,🔽Not through the eyes or the hands.

original: mig dang lag pas ma yin no; ;gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing //
analyzed: mig dang lag pas ma yin no; ;gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing //
translated: This secret should not be shown

original: rab tu 'bad de sba ba dang // blo ldan mthe chung bskyed par ni //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad de sba ba dang // blo ldan mthe chung bskyed par ni //
translated: in the gesture of “the hook.”

original: pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas //
analyzed: pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas //
translated: The messengers are of three types:

original: dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste //
analyzed: dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste //
translated: pure, impure, and mixed.

original: sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas //
translated: The adept is also of three types:🔽the one who pleases, the one who is pure,

original: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o //
analyzed: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o //
translated: and the one who is endowed with qualities.

original: yul yul du ni dka' thub can; ;pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma brtag /
analyzed: yul yul du ni dka' thub can; ;pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma brtag /
translated: In every country, the ascetic should examine the signs of the messengers.

original: pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing //
analyzed: pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing //
translated: The messenger is like the edge of a sword,

original: dag byed pa bsod nams 'phel byed yin //🔽de bzhin pho nya legs 'dres pas //
analyzed: dag byed pa bsod nams 'phel byed yin // de bzhin pho nya legs 'dres pas //
translated: and the one who purifies increases merit.🔽In the same way, the adept obtains power

original: sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob //
translated: through the messenger who is well mixed.

original: bzlas mchod bsam gtan med par yang //
analyzed: bzlas mchod bsam gtan med par yang //
translated: Even without mantra, worship, or meditation,

original: myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: he will quickly succeed.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa pos //
translated: The adept who practices with mantra and gesture

original: mchod @269b pa nyid la rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: mchod @269b pa nyid la rab tu 'jug /
translated: is engaged in the very best worship.

original: 'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de //
analyzed: 'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de //
translated: There is no worship higher than this;

original: de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin //
translated: such is the rule of the treatise.

original: pho nya'i lam la dga' ba dang // sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson; ;rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
analyzed: pho nya'i lam la dga' ba dang // sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson; ;rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
translated: united with the knowledge-seal,

original: zas la rtag tu spyad par bya //
analyzed: zas la rtag tu spyad par bya //
translated: should always enjoy the food.

original: sgrub pa po ni legs pa ru //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni legs pa ru //
translated: The adept,

original: mnyam par bzhag pa'i rigs rnams ni //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag pa'i rigs rnams ni //
translated: in the state of union,

original: kun la nye bar spyad bya zhing //
analyzed: kun la nye bar spyad bya zhing //
translated: should enjoy all the families,

original: bza' min par ni mi brtag go /
analyzed: bza' min par ni mi brtag go /
translated: without considering them as unfit to eat.

original: 'di nyid du ni de dbyer med //
analyzed: 'di nyid du ni de dbyer med //
translated: Here they are inseparable,

original: pho nya mo yi sgrub pa nyid //
analyzed: pho nya mo yi sgrub pa nyid //
translated: just the practice of the messenger.

original: dngos grub cho ga la spyod tshe //
analyzed: dngos grub cho ga la spyod tshe //
translated: When one practices the rite for power,🔽the messenger is the only one.

original: pho nya gcig pu kho na yin; ;byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub ni //
analyzed: pho nya gcig pu kho na yin; ;byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub ni //
translated: The power of the factors of enlightenment🔽is attained through practice and proximity,

original: sgrub pa dag dang nye bar dang // bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i //
analyzed: sgrub pa dag dang nye bar dang // bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i //
translated: and through the initiation received in the lineage of teachers.

original: dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan //
analyzed: dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan //
translated: The adept, endowed with the mantra,

original: pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad //
analyzed: pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad //
translated: is rightly declared to be a messenger.🔽The nature of the seal is the union,🔽the giving without attachment, the morality,

original: phyag rgya legs sbyor ngang tshul dang // chags med gtong dang tshul khrims dang // ye shes chu skyes yang dag rdzogs //
analyzed: phyag rgya legs sbyor ngang tshul dang // chags med gtong dang tshul khrims dang // ye shes chu skyes yang dag rdzogs //
translated: and the perfect completion of the lotus of wisdom.

original: sems kyis bdag nyid nang par langs //
analyzed: sems kyis bdag nyid nang par langs //
translated: One should rise in the morning with a mind

original: lus kyi bya ba kun byas te //🔽lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni //
analyzed: lus kyi bya ba kun byas te // lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni //
translated: that has performed all bodily actions.🔽One should always practice with a body

original: lus la gnas par kun tu spyad //
analyzed: lus la gnas par kun tu spyad //
translated: that is well-armed with weapons.

original: dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni //
analyzed: dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni //
translated: With a body that has been purified,

original: rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya; ;rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing //
analyzed: rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya; ;rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing //
translated: one should always recite the mantra.

original: mtshon cha rnams ni 'gom mi bya //🔽dam tshig can la khro mi bya //
analyzed: mtshon cha rnams ni 'gom mi bya // dam tshig can la khro mi bya //
translated: One should not step over the weapons🔽that have been taught in the yoga treatises.🔽One should not be angry with those who have samaya,

original: mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya //🔽de dang lta @270a *//
analyzed: mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya // de dang lta @270a *//
translated: and one should not transgress the diligent ones.

original: lhan cig bde bar bya //
analyzed: lhan cig bde bar bya //
translated: One should always be happy🔽with those who have the view.

original: bdag gi don dang gzhan don du //
analyzed: bdag gi don dang gzhan don du //
translated: For one’s own benefit and the benefit of others,

original: dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya //
translated: one should practice the conduct of samaya.

original: 'di la lhan cig longs spyod bya //
analyzed: 'di la lhan cig longs spyod bya //
translated: One should enjoy this together with them.

original: mtshan mo rtag par nam mkha'i go /
analyzed: mtshan mo rtag par nam mkha'i go /
translated: One should always be in the sky at night,

original: nag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya //
analyzed: nag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya //
translated: always changing between black and red.

original: srog chags yan lag las byung gyon //
analyzed: srog chags yan lag las byung gyon //
translated: One should wear clothes made from animal parts;

original: bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur //
translated: one who desires bliss will attain bliss.

original: mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs gtsing //
analyzed: mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs gtsing //
translated: One should be clean, having abandoned the upavīta.

original: shra'i he ru kas byin brlabs pas //
analyzed: shra'i he ru kas byin brlabs pas //
translated: One should be blessed by Śrī Heruka.

original: phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan //
translated: And is endowed with the five symbolic ornaments,

original: dus kun tu ni yang dag gnas //
analyzed: dus kun tu ni yang dag gnas //
translated: Always abides in the right way.🔽One should not look at the caste or non-caste,

original: rigs dang rigs min dor mi blta; ;spyi gtsug la sogs bcing pa spang //
analyzed: rigs dang rigs min dor mi blta; ;spyi gtsug la sogs bcing pa spang //
translated: And should avoid binding the crown and so forth.

original: pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin //
analyzed: pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin //
translated: Purity is the first messenger,

original: gnyis pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod //
analyzed: gnyis pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod //
translated: And the second is considered to be union.

original: zas gcig tu ni za ba nyid //
analyzed: zas gcig tu ni za ba nyid //
translated: Eating only one meal a day

original: gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad //
analyzed: gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad //
translated: Is explained to be the third purity.

original: gtsang sbra 'di dag rab sbyangs pas //
analyzed: gtsang sbra 'di dag rab sbyangs pas //
translated: By thoroughly training in these purities,

original: gtsang ma'i dag pa'i rim thob na //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i dag pa'i rim thob na //
translated: Having attained the stage of pure purity,

original: dngos grub gang la 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub gang la 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: What accomplishments will not arise?🔽Whatever is taught in the Compendium of Reality

original: de nyid bsdus las gang gsungs dang // de bzhin bde mchog las gang gsungs //
analyzed: de nyid bsdus las gang gsungs dang // de bzhin bde mchog las gang gsungs //
translated: And likewise in the Cakrasaṃvara,

original: gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag bshad //
analyzed: gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag bshad //
translated: Is well explained in the Secret Tantra.🔽Similarly, it is taught in the Śrī Paramadya

original: de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid las gsungs //
analyzed: de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid las gsungs //
translated: And in the Vajrabhairava itself.

original: bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs pa 'grub //
analyzed: bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs pa 'grub //
translated: Recitation, observances, and so forth are accomplished.

original: de 'dir bsam gtan tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: de 'dir bsam gtan tsam gyis ni //
translated: Here, by mere concentration,

original: sngags pas skad cig gis @270b 'grub 'gyur //
analyzed: sngags pas skad cig gis @270b 'grub 'gyur //
translated: The mantra practitioner will instantly accomplish

original: rnal 'byor lam la dga' bas kyang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lam la dga' bas kyang //
translated: And also those who delight in the path of yoga,

original: gtsang sbra 'di ni yang dag spyad //
analyzed: gtsang sbra 'di ni yang dag spyad //
translated: Should practice this purification.

original: bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung gang //
analyzed: bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung gang //
translated: Whatever merit arises from purification,

original: sgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po; ;stong phrag gcig pa'i zhal min par //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po; ;stong phrag gcig pa'i zhal min par //
translated: The vast qualities of accomplishment,

original: kha cig gis ni brjod mi nus //
analyzed: kha cig gis ni brjod mi nus //
translated: Cannot be expressed by anyone🔽Other than the one with a thousand faces.

original: dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che //
analyzed: dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che //
translated: The glorious blood-drinking one's great wisdom,

original: rnam dag mtshan nyid kun sgrub pa //
analyzed: rnam dag mtshan nyid kun sgrub pa //
translated: The accomplishment of all pure characteristics,

original: bde ba'i bsod nams chu 'thung ba //
analyzed: bde ba'i bsod nams chu 'thung ba //
translated: Drinking the water of blissful merit,

original: dag byed sdig pa 'jigs byed yin //
analyzed: dag byed sdig pa 'jigs byed yin //
translated: Is the purifier, the destroyer of the fear of evil.

original: reg pa dang ni smras pas kyang //
analyzed: reg pa dang ni smras pas kyang //
translated: Even by touch and speech,

original: sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
analyzed: sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
translated: One is completely liberated from all evil,🔽And with a body and speech free of faults,

original: lus ngag skyon ni med pa yi; ;gang zhig spyod pa byed pa yi //
analyzed: lus ngag skyon ni med pa yi; ;gang zhig spyod pa byed pa yi //
translated: Whoever engages in this conduct,

original: mi mchog sdig pa thams cad ni //
analyzed: mi mchog sdig pa thams cad ni //
translated: That supreme human, all their evil

original: rnam dag bdag nyid bde gshegs kyi //
analyzed: rnam dag bdag nyid bde gshegs kyi //
translated: Purified, becomes a blissful self,

original: sa rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: And attains the stages of the Sugatas.

original: skye zhing skyo bar de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: skye zhing skyo bar de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Thus born, they become a Tathagata,

original: rigs 'gyur chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur //
analyzed: rigs 'gyur chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur //
translated: A king of the lineage, endowed with Dharma.

original: de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas //
analyzed: de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas //
translated: Having thus always made offerings,

original: dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin //
translated: One should give the sacrificial cake with faith.

original: de nas mchod pa rnam dag pas //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa rnam dag pas //
translated: Then, with pure worship,

original: mya ngan 'das las byung ba 'o //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das las byung ba 'o //
translated: one should emerge from nirvana.🔽In the same way, one should worship oneself,🔽all the buddhas and the assembly of bodhisattvas,

original: de bzhin bdag nyid mchod pa dang // sangs rgyas kun tshogs sras bcas dang // dpa' bo akun dang rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag nyid mchod pa dang // sangs rgyas kun tshogs sras bcas dang // dpa' bo akun dang rnal 'byor ma //
translated: the heroes and yoginīs,🔽the animate and inanimate,

original: brtan pa dag dang g-yo ba dang // spun gyi mchod pa'i dus 'dzin pa //
analyzed: brtan pa dag dang g-yo ba dang // spun gyi mchod pa'i dus 'dzin pa //
translated: and the time of worship of the siblings.

original: zla ba'i dus la gnas pa yi //
analyzed: zla ba'i dus la gnas pa yi //
translated: Abiding in the time of the moon,

original: spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu //
translated: together with the siblings and sons,

original: bde dang sdug bsngal kun @271a *//
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal kun @271a *//
translated: all the happiness and suffering🔽arises.🔽The mantra and likewise the mudrā

original: 'byung ba // sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang // ye shes der ni bstan mi bya //
analyzed: 'byung ba // sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang // ye shes der ni bstan mi bya //
translated: should not be shown there.

original: dag byed zas la spyod pa ni //
analyzed: dag byed zas la spyod pa ni //
translated: The conduct of eating the purifying food

original: rtag tu dam tshig spyod byas 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu dam tshig spyod byas 'gyur //
translated: always becomes the conduct of the vow.

original: gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya //
translated: The mantra should not be given to anyone,

original: man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya //🔽dam tshig gnas la ci rigs par //
analyzed: man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya // dam tshig gnas la ci rigs par //
translated: nor should the esoteric instructions be lost.🔽The esoteric instructions should be given

original: man ngag rnams kyang sbyin par bya; ;pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la //
analyzed: man ngag rnams kyang sbyin par bya; ;pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la //
translated: to those who abide in the vow, as appropriate.

original: 'dod pa rmongs par 'gro mi byed //🔽rtag tu pho nya chags bral ba //
analyzed: 'dod pa rmongs par 'gro mi byed // rtag tu pho nya chags bral ba //
translated: One should not go to a place of desire out of delusion.

original: mi 'da' ba yis longs spyod bya //
analyzed: mi 'da' ba yis longs spyod bya //
translated: One should always enjoy the messenger who is free of passion,🔽not one who is beyond the pale.

original: skye gnas dman la mi gnas pa //
analyzed: skye gnas dman la mi gnas pa //
translated: One should not dwell in a low birth,

original: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
translated: nor should one serve.🔽One should abide as a mother, sister, daughter,

original: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas //
analyzed: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas //
translated: wife, or messenger.🔽One should definitely destroy the difficulties

original: 'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la //🔽dka' ba nges par zad par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la // dka' ba nges par zad par 'gyur //
translated: on the wheel or in the same way in the accomplishment.

original: mchog dang tha ma ldan cig 'gugs //
analyzed: mchog dang tha ma ldan cig 'gugs //
translated: One should summon the one endowed with the best and the worst.

original: de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin //
analyzed: de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin //
translated: Thus, the substances are ascertained.

original: rnal 'byor pa rtag g-yon nas spyod //🔽rkang pa g-yon pa sngon du 'dor //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rtag g-yon nas spyod // rkang pa g-yon pa sngon du 'dor //
translated: The yogī always practices with the left.🔽He puts the left foot forward.

original: lag pa g-yon pa yongs su bsgyur //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa yongs su bsgyur //
translated: He turns with the left hand.

original: g-yon gyi phyed ni rab mchod byed //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyed ni rab mchod byed //
translated: He worships the left side.

original: lus ni g-yon ni rnam par gnon //
analyzed: lus ni g-yon ni rnam par gnon //
translated: He conquers with the left body.

original: g-yon pa yis ni tshim  dang za //
analyzed: g-yon pa yis ni tshim  dang za //
translated: He is satisfied and eats with the left.

original: brtul bzhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs //
analyzed: brtul bzhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs //
translated: He is not fallen, he is perfect in conduct.

original: sgrub pa po ni dam tshig brtson //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni dam tshig brtson //
translated: The adept is diligent in the commitments.

original: dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang // lhan cig zas @271b la spyod par byed //
analyzed: dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang // lhan cig zas @271b la spyod par byed //
translated: and enjoy food together with the heroes.

original: rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa'i //
analyzed: rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa'i //
translated: The conduct in the five families

original: rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bsgrags //
analyzed: rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bsgrags //
translated: is proclaimed to be of four kinds.

original: rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa'i //
analyzed: rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa'i //
translated: The conduct in the one family

original: rnal 'byor sgrub la rab tu mchod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sgrub la rab tu mchod //
translated: is highly praised in the yoga of practice.🔽The flesh of cows, horses, and dogs,

original: pa lang sha dang rta sha dang // khyi sha dag dang sna tshogs pas //
analyzed: pa lang sha dang rta sha dang // khyi sha dag dang sna tshogs pas //
translated: and various other meats,

original: dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas na ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas na ni //
translated: if one makes a triangular maṇḍala,

original: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /
translated: even the buddhas will certainly be destroyed.

original: sgrub pa po yis rnga @279b brdungs shing //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yis rnga @279b brdungs shing //
translated: The adept should beat a drum

original: ha ha zhes ni brjod pa'ang bya //
analyzed: ha ha zhes ni brjod pa'ang bya //
translated: And also say “ha ha.”

original: de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor //
translated: Thus, having worshipped the maṇḍala

original: 'dod pa kun ldan mchod nas ni //
analyzed: 'dod pa kun ldan mchod nas ni //
translated: In accordance with the rite, endowed with all desired [offerings],

original: de yi bu sdug gdong la ni //
analyzed: de yi bu sdug gdong la ni //
translated: One should place the face of the beloved

original: dar gyis legs par bka' nas su; ;me tog gis bkang thal mo dag /
analyzed: dar gyis legs par bka' nas su; ;me tog gis bkang thal mo dag /
translated: Having well covered it with silk,🔽and having filled one’s palms with flowers,

original: padmas gtor nas bskor ba ni //
analyzed: padmas gtor nas bskor ba ni //
translated: one should scatter them with a lotus [gesture],

original: g-yon phyogs bskor nas phyag byas te //
analyzed: g-yon phyogs bskor nas phyag byas te //
translated: and circumambulate [the maṇḍala] to the left,🔽and make prostrations,

original: h'um dang phat kyi sgra yang brjod //
analyzed: h'um dang phat kyi sgra yang brjod //
translated: and utter the sounds of hūṃ and phaṭ.

original: g-yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis; ;dngos grub sras po gzhag par bya //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis; ;dngos grub sras po gzhag par bya //
translated: One should place the son [i.e., the disciple] in the position of the siddhi🔽with the right leg extended.

original: thal mo me tog gtor nas ni //
analyzed: thal mo me tog gtor nas ni //
translated: Having scattered flowers with one’s palms,

original: gang du babs pa'i bsam pa ni //🔽bskor ba dag kyang byas nas su //
analyzed: gang du babs pa'i bsam pa ni // bskor ba dag kyang byas nas su //
translated: one should contemplate where [the flower] falls.🔽Having circumambulated,

original: shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis; ;sgrub pa po yis byas nas gzhug /
analyzed: shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis; ;sgrub pa po yis byas nas gzhug /
translated: the adept, well equipoised, should enter.

original: de nas yon thogs grong khyer du //
analyzed: de nas yon thogs grong khyer du //
translated: Then, in the city of the gift,

original: g-yas pa'i phyogs su brten nas ni //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyogs su brten nas ni //
translated: having relied on the right side,

original: snyim pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dor //
analyzed: snyim pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dor //
translated: one should cast the flower of the cupped palms into the maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor gang du me tog babs //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gang du me tog babs //
translated: In whatever maṇḍala the flower falls,

original: de yi rigs ni bstan par bya //
analyzed: de yi rigs ni bstan par bya //
translated: one should declare its family.

original: de nas slob dpon legs par ni //
analyzed: de nas slob dpon legs par ni //
translated: Then the master, well equipoised,

original: rab mnyam bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod //
analyzed: rab mnyam bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod //
translated: should worship with the mudrā.

original: de nas slob ma gnyis pa la //
analyzed: de nas slob ma gnyis pa la //
translated: Then, for the second disciple,

original: mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis //🔽de la thig le bya ba yin //
analyzed: mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis // de la thig le bya ba yin //
translated: with the three recitations of the great vermilion.

original: de nas slob ma'i gdong phye la //
analyzed: de nas slob ma'i gdong phye la //
translated: Then, having opened the eyes of the disciple,

original: dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya //
translated: one should show the maṇḍala.

original: gang gi lha yi gnas gang yin //
analyzed: gang gi lha yi gnas gang yin //
translated: Wherever the deity’s place is,

original: der de yang dag bstan pa bya //
analyzed: der de yang dag bstan pa bya //
translated: there one should show it.

original: slob dpon dang ni lhan cig tu //
analyzed: slob dpon dang ni lhan cig tu //
translated: Together with the master,

original: rab tu btud pa byas nas ni //🔽g-yon nas brtsams pa'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: rab tu btud pa byas nas ni // g-yon nas brtsams pa'i rim pa yis //
translated: having bowed down,

original: de nas bskor ba rab tu bya //🔽dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la //
analyzed: de nas bskor ba rab tu bya // dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la //
translated: one should then circumambulate🔽in the sequence beginning from the left.🔽One should offer prostrations

original: @280a *// ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya 'o //
analyzed: @280a *// ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya 'o //
translated: to the maṇḍala and the guru in the proper way.

original: de nas bla ma dag la yon //
analyzed: de nas bla ma dag la yon //
translated: Then, one should offer the fee

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul //
translated: to the guru, as taught by the Tathāgata.🔽One should offer a hundred thousand gold coins,🔽various kinds of jewels,🔽a hundred pairs of garments,

original: gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang // rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang // glang po rta 'am yul 'khor ram //
analyzed: gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang // rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang // glang po rta 'am yul 'khor ram //
translated: elephants, horses, or a kingdom,🔽earrings, bracelets,

original: rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang // mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang // gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs //
analyzed: rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang // mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang // gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs //
translated: necklaces, anklets, and excellent golden parasols,

original: chung ma bzad dang bu mo nyid //
analyzed: chung ma bzad dang bu mo nyid //
translated: One’s wife, daughter, and even one’s own self,

original: bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams //
analyzed: bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams //
translated: one’s male and female servants, and one’s sister,

original: phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya //
analyzed: phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya //
translated: having bowed down, one should offer them.

original: ded nas brtsams te bran du ni //
analyzed: ded nas brtsams te bran du ni //
translated: Having begun with the offering, one should say,

original: khyed la bdag ni dbul lags zhes //
analyzed: khyed la bdag ni dbul lags zhes //
translated: ‘I offer myself to you.’

original: blo ldan kun nas dang ba yis //
analyzed: blo ldan kun nas dang ba yis //
translated: With a mind full of faith,

original: bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya //🔽de ltar nges par bya ba ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya // de ltar nges par bya ba ni //
translated: one should offer oneself.🔽In this way, the practitioner should

original: sgrub pa po yis rab nges byas //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yis rab nges byas //
translated: definitely make this resolve.

original: de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: Then the ḍākinīs

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur //
translated: and yoginīs will be pleased with him.

original: mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //🔽sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma // sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig /
translated: The ḍākinīs, the Lāmās, the Khaṇḍarohā, and the Rūpiṇīs🔽will be pleased with the practitioner.🔽Together with the ḍākinīs,

original: de dang rnam spyod 'gro ba kun; ;sgrub pa po ni de dag gi /
analyzed: de dang rnam spyod 'gro ba kun; ;sgrub pa po ni de dag gi /
translated: the practitioner will be able to go everywhere,

original: ci bgyi byed par the tshom med //
analyzed: ci bgyi byed par the tshom med //
translated: and he will have no doubt that he will be able to do whatever they say.

original: rnal 'byor 'di ni grub gyur na //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di ni grub gyur na //
translated: When this yoga is accomplished,

original: 'jig rten gsum du mi ldog cing //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum du mi ldog cing //
translated: one will not return to the three worlds,

original: mi snang phug dang gnas mkha' rgyu; ;rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len //
analyzed: mi snang phug dang gnas mkha' rgyu; ;rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len //
translated: and one will become invisible, a sky-goer, a swift-footed one, and an alchemist.

original: sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis //
translated: The adept is born at will

original: rtag par rgyun du skyes par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag par rgyun du skyes par 'gyur //
translated: and always in a continuous [series of] births.

original: gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang // nam mkha' la ni 'gro @280b bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang // nam mkha' la ni 'gro @280b bar 'gyur //
translated: He can assume many forms, and can travel through space,

original: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi khyad par du //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi khyad par du //
translated: and can especially

original: nges gnon 'gro ba thams cad kyang //
analyzed: nges gnon 'gro ba thams cad kyang //
translated: overpower all migrating beings.

original: lan cig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: lan cig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of a single glance

original: skad cig gis ni sbyor nyid skyed //🔽sngags pas dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar //
analyzed: skad cig gis ni sbyor nyid skyed // sngags pas dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar //
translated: he instantly generates the union.🔽The mantrin who desires to be a yogin

original: gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod //
analyzed: gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod //
translated: without seeing the maṇḍala🔽is like one who strikes the sky with his fist

original: mkha' la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang // smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thungs dang mtshungs //
analyzed: mkha' la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang // smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thungs dang mtshungs //
translated: or drinks the water of a mirage.🔽This yoga is the best of the best

original: rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang // sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa'i yin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang // sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa'i yin //
translated: and the most excellent of all the practices.

original: gang zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa //
analyzed: gang zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa //
translated: One who always desires it

original: de ni lha mi zil gnon 'gro //🔽de nyid bsdus par gyur pa'am //🔽gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las //
analyzed: de ni lha mi zil gnon 'gro // de nyid bsdus par gyur pa'am // gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las //
translated: will overpower gods and men.

original: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di //
translated: This king of maṇḍalas

original: ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: has not arisen and will not arise🔽in the Compendium of Reality,🔽in the Secret, or in Vajrabhairava.

original: bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung //
analyzed: bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung //
translated: Whatever is explained or not explained,

original: de kun dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnas //🔽mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: de kun dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnas // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: all of that is the abode of glorious Heruka.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the forty-ninth chapter of the Tantra of the Supreme Original Buddha, the Great King of Teachings.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: sbyor ba'i mtshams dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i mtshams dang yang dag ldan //
translated: the boundary endowed with union.

original: chu med pa ni mtshams yin te //
analyzed: chu med pa ni mtshams yin te //
translated: The boundary is without water,

original: gos pa med cing chags spangs pa //
analyzed: gos pa med cing chags spangs pa //
translated: unstained, and free from attachment.

original: mtshams ni 'byung po thams cad pa //
analyzed: mtshams ni 'byung po thams cad pa //
translated: The boundary is for all spirits,

original: de ni sems can thams cad de //
analyzed: de ni sems can thams cad de //
translated: and that is for all sentient beings.

original: mtshams ni srid pa dag pa ste //
analyzed: mtshams ni srid pa dag pa ste //
translated: The boundary is the purification of existence,

original: dbyangs skyong he ru ka nyid yin //
analyzed: dbyangs skyong he ru ka nyid yin //
translated: and the melody is Heruka himself.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom shing bzla //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom shing bzla //
translated: The yogi/nī should meditate and recite.

original: gcig car 'byung bar snang ba ste //
analyzed: gcig car 'byung bar snang ba ste //
translated: It appears as a simultaneous occurrence,

original: dung dang kun da'i mdog kyang 'dzin //
analyzed: dung dang kun da'i mdog kyang 'dzin //
translated: and it holds the color of a conch and jasmine.

original: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
analyzed: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
translated: It is completely perfect with all ornaments,

original: @281a *// mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste //
analyzed: @281a *// mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste //
translated: and it is marked with all the signs.

original: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //
analyzed: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //
translated: It has three faces and six arms.

original: spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams //
translated: The three eyes are the experience of compassion.

original: skra grol dpral bar thod pa ste //
analyzed: skra grol dpral bar thod pa ste //
translated: The hair is loose, and there is a skull on the forehead.

original: spyi gtsug tu ni zla ba 'o //
analyzed: spyi gtsug tu ni zla ba 'o //
translated: There is a moon on the crown of the head.

original: he ru ka dpal yang dag ldan //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal yang dag ldan //
translated: The utterly pure one is endowed with glorious Heruka.

original: mtshams rnams grub pa'i mchog dam pa //
analyzed: mtshams rnams grub pa'i mchog dam pa //
translated: The directions are the supreme, sublime accomplishments.

original: thun bzhi ru ni bya ba 'o //
analyzed: thun bzhi ru ni bya ba 'o //
translated: One should practice in four sessions.🔽The four joys are joy, supreme joy,

original: dga' ba bzhi po dga' ba dang // lte ba'i snying pad nu ma'i dbus //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi po dga' ba dang // lte ba'i snying pad nu ma'i dbus //
translated: the navel, the heart, the lotus, and the middle of the breasts.

original: lce yi rtsa dang mgo steng du //🔽dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid //
analyzed: lce yi rtsa dang mgo steng du // dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid //
translated: The channel of the tongue and the top of the head🔽are joy and supreme joy.

original: dam par dga' dang lhan cig skyes //
analyzed: dam par dga' dang lhan cig skyes //
translated: The sublime joy and the connate joy🔽are in the secret place and the crown of the head.

original: dang po 'dab ma drug cu bzhi //
analyzed: dang po 'dab ma drug cu bzhi //
translated: The first has sixty-four petals,🔽the second is the supreme one with eight petals,

original: gnyis pa brgyad pa mchog yin te; ;gsum pa 'dab ma bcu drug pa //
analyzed: gnyis pa brgyad pa mchog yin te; ;gsum pa 'dab ma bcu drug pa //
translated: the third has sixteen petals,

original: bzhi pa sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab //🔽phag mo'i lte ba'i rtsar gnas pa //
analyzed: bzhi pa sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab // phag mo'i lte ba'i rtsar gnas pa //
translated: and the fourth has thirty-two petals.

original: lhan cig skyes dga' khrag 'thung mchog /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga' khrag 'thung mchog /
translated: The connate joy, the supreme blood drinker,🔽is located in the channel of the navel.

original: sbyor ba'i dus kyi mtshams su ni //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dus kyi mtshams su ni //
translated: At the time of union,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom bya //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom bya //
translated: one should meditate on the four noble truths.

original: sdug bsngal sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: sdug bsngal sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste //
translated: The truth of suffering is the emanation wheel.

original: kun 'byung chos kyi 'khor lo yin //
analyzed: kun 'byung chos kyi 'khor lo yin //
translated: Is the wheel of the Dharma of origination.

original: 'gog pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: 'gog pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste //
translated: The wheel of enjoyment is cessation,

original: lam ni bde ba chen po yin //
analyzed: lam ni bde ba chen po yin //
translated: And the path is great bliss.

original: de ltar mtshams su byin brlabs nas //
analyzed: de ltar mtshams su byin brlabs nas //
translated: Having thus consecrated the boundaries,

original: rnal 'byor nges pa byas pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor nges pa byas pa ste /
translated: The yogi should perform the rite.

original: dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang // spyan gsum thugs rje stong pa'i nyams //🔽rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang // spyan gsum thugs rje stong pa'i nyams // rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum gyis //
translated: White, blue, and green, with three eyes, the experience of compassion and emptiness,

original: yongs su dag par rim par sbyor //
analyzed: yongs su dag par rim par sbyor //
translated: Completely pure through the three liberations and the three bodies,

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //🔽thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
translated: Possessing the vajra and the bell,🔽Holding the skull and khaṭvāṅga,

original: mgo bo gri gug phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: mgo bo gri gug phyag na bsnams //
translated: Holding a head and a flaying knife in his hands,

original: sems dpa'i dkyil @281b mo krung  du bzhugs //
analyzed: sems dpa'i dkyil @281b mo krung  du bzhugs //
translated: Seated in the sattva posture,

original: zla ba yi dvags pad dbus su //
analyzed: zla ba yi dvags pad dbus su //
translated: In the center of a moon, a corpse, and a lotus,

original: skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin //
analyzed: skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin //
translated: With loose hair and wearing the garments of the directions,

original: dgyes pa'i nyams kyis myos pa ste //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i nyams kyis myos pa ste //
translated: Intoxicated with the experience of joy,

original: dus rtag tu ni mtshams bsgoms na //
analyzed: dus rtag tu ni mtshams bsgoms na //
translated: Always meditating on the boundaries,

original: sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin //
analyzed: sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin //
translated: The supreme vow is accomplished.

original: dri chen rdo rje chu dang ni //
analyzed: dri chen rdo rje chu dang ni //
translated: Vajra feces, vajra water,

original: rin chen snang ba mtha' yas dang // don yod grub pa'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: rin chen snang ba mtha' yas dang // don yod grub pa'ang de bzhin te //
translated: The jewel, the infinite light, and also Amoghasiddhi,

original: de dag rtag tu bsres nas su //
analyzed: de dag rtag tu bsres nas su //
translated: always mixing them together,🔽the yogin always bows to the boundary.

original: rnal 'byor rtag tu mtshams la 'dud gsang sngags 'di dag rtag tu yang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rtag tu mtshams la 'dud gsang sngags 'di dag rtag tu yang //
translated: These secret mantras are always

original: he ru ka ni dbyangs skyong mchog /
analyzed: he ru ka ni dbyangs skyong mchog /
translated: the supreme melody-protector Heruka.🔽Oṃ śrī herukāya vi-mahe vidyā-rājāya dhiḥ

original: aom shr'i he ru k'a ya bi ma he bidy'a r'a dza ya dh'i:ma he tam no b'i ra pra dzo da ya a'a: h'um/
analyzed: aom shr'i he ru k'a ya bi ma he bidy'a r'a dza ya dh'i:ma he tam no b'i ra pra dzo da ya a'a: h'um/
translated: mahendra-tanovirāja-āḥ hūṃ.🔽Always visualizing the boundary,

original: rtag tu mtshams ni rnam bsgoms na; ;dbyangs skyong mchog gi bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: rtag tu mtshams ni rnam bsgoms na; ;dbyangs skyong mchog gi bzlas pa bya //
translated: one should perform the recitation of the supreme melody-protector.

original: dbyangs skyong ming ni rig byed de //
analyzed: dbyangs skyong ming ni rig byed de //
translated: The melody-protector is known as the Veda,

original: las rnams thams cad byed pa dge //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad byed pa dge //
translated: virtuous in performing all actions.

original: dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing //
translated: One will not die an untimely death,

original: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang yang grub; ;'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi //
analyzed: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang yang grub; ;'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi //
translated: and will accomplish pacification, increase, and power.

original: don ni sngags pa rtag tu smra //
analyzed: don ni sngags pa rtag tu smra //
translated: The mantra practitioner always speaks🔽of the past, future, and present purposes.

original: dngos grub 'di ni rab tu 'grub //
analyzed: dngos grub 'di ni rab tu 'grub //
translated: This accomplishment is fully accomplished,

original: de ma thag tu grub chen bcas //
analyzed: de ma thag tu grub chen bcas //
translated: immediately endowed with the great accomplishment.

original: 'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin //
translated: The three worlds are accomplished.

original: sgrub po'i dbang pos rnam bsgoms te //
analyzed: sgrub po'i dbang pos rnam bsgoms te //
translated: The adept, having meditated with the eye of the senses,

original: khrag 'thung cho ga bzhin shes nas //
analyzed: khrag 'thung cho ga bzhin shes nas //
translated: knowing the procedure of the blood-drinkers,

original: zhag gsum brtul zhugs la gnas na //
analyzed: zhag gsum brtul zhugs la gnas na //
translated: should maintain the observances for three days,

original: lha yi gnas su 'gro ba yin //
analyzed: lha yi gnas su 'gro ba yin //
translated: and he will go to the abode of the gods.

original: lha yi ye shes thob nas ni //
analyzed: lha yi ye shes thob nas ni //

analyzed: lha yi lus kyi mchog kyang 'dzin //

original: ngag rnams kun la dbang thob cing //
analyzed: ngag rnams kun la dbang thob cing //

original: thams cad mkhyen par gyur nas su //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen par gyur nas su //

original: rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs /
analyzed: rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs /

analyzed: @282a *// sangs rgyas lha yis bsten pa ste //

original: srid par sangs rgyas rol par mdzad //
analyzed: srid par sangs rgyas rol par mdzad //

original: nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du yang //
analyzed: nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du yang //

analyzed: phyag rgya lhan cig 'byung pa spyad; ;mthong nas srid mo yang dag sgrub //

analyzed: zhag gsum bar du mchod byas nas //

original: rdo rje he ru ka dpal lha //
analyzed: rdo rje he ru ka dpal lha //

analyzed: thams cad kyang ni byon par 'gyur //

analyzed: pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni; ;de yis phyag ni byas nas kyang //

analyzed: sgrub pos rtag tu mchod par bya //

original: sgrub po 'dod la dga' bas ni /
analyzed: sgrub po 'dod la dga' bas ni /

original: mod la dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen //
analyzed: mod la dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen //

analyzed: gtso bo thams cad 'dzin pa ste //

analyzed: khams gsum kun tu rnam spyod cing //

analyzed: sgrub pa po ni mchog tu 'gyur //

analyzed: 'di ni dpa' chen dpa' bo ste //

analyzed: gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs //

original: de ni rnam par shes tsam gyis //
analyzed: de ni rnam par shes tsam gyis //

analyzed: sa gzhi ska rags kyis bskor ba //

analyzed: mod la dbang du gyur pa yin // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las //

analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

analyzed: yi ge bdun pa sgom pa ste //

analyzed: yi ge h'um las yang dag 'byung //

analyzed: yi ge nyi shu gnyis las byung //

analyzed: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis mchog /

analyzed: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: yi ge re re dgod pa ste; ;mkha' 'gro ma yi snying de bzhin //

original: h'um shr'i lha dang lha mo ste //
analyzed: h'um shr'i lha dang lha mo ste //

original: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'o //

original: dbus su rnam dag bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: dbus su rnam dag bcom ldan 'das //

original: sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya //

original: rnam par thar brgyad sgo sna tshogs //
analyzed: rnam par thar brgyad sgo sna tshogs //

original: gzugs su lta ba stong pa ste //
analyzed: gzugs su lta ba stong pa ste //

analyzed: nang gzugs med par phyi rol gzugs su lta ba'ang stong pa yin //
translated: The view of external form without internal form is also empty.

original: sdug dang mi sdug mthong bar byed pa lta ba'ang stong pa yin //
analyzed: sdug dang mi sdug mthong bar byed pa lta ba'ang stong pa yin //
translated: The view of seeing the pleasant and unpleasant is also empty.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa ste //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa ste //
translated: The view of the sphere of infinite space is also empty.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin //
translated: The view of the sphere of infinite consciousness is also empty.

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin //
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin //
translated: The view of the sphere of nothingness is also empty.

original: 'du shes med cing 'du shes med min skye mched rnams kyang stong pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med cing 'du shes med min skye mched rnams kyang stong pa'o //

original: 'du shes dang ni tshor ba'ang 'gog par lta ba stong pa yin //
analyzed: 'du shes dang ni tshor ba'ang 'gog par lta ba stong pa yin //
translated: The view of the cessation of perception and feeling is also empty.

original: phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa ste //
analyzed: phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa ste //
translated: The sixteen hands are also empty.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang // phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang // chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang // phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang // chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba @286b med pa stong pa nyid dang // rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of non-entities,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /

analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du //

original: phag mo yang ni de bzhin te //
analyzed: phag mo yang ni de bzhin te //

original: gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'das //

original: he ru ka dpa' rnam par shes //
analyzed: he ru ka dpa' rnam par shes //

original: phag mo nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: phag mo nam mkha' lta bu'o //

original: lha mo bzhi yis rnam dag pa //
analyzed: lha mo bzhi yis rnam dag pa //

original: gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni //
analyzed: gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni //

analyzed: don rnams so sor yang dag rig /

analyzed: rta gdong ma gang yin pa 'o; ;chos rnams so sor yang dag rig /

original: rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'gro ma //

original: nges tshig so so yang dag rig /
analyzed: nges tshig so so yang dag rig /

original: gser mdog can gyi mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: gser mdog can gyi mkha' 'gro ma //

original: spobs pa so sor yang dag rig /
analyzed: spobs pa so sor yang dag rig /

original: lha mo de dag 'dab ma'i dbus //
analyzed: lha mo de dag 'dab ma'i dbus //
translated: Those goddesses are in the center of the petals.

original: rton pa rnam pa bzhi po ni //
analyzed: rton pa rnam pa bzhi po ni //

original: he li ka ni don la rton pa ste //
analyzed: he li ka ni don la rton pa ste //

original: ru tsa ki ni tshig 'brur rton pa yin //
analyzed: ru tsa ki ni tshig 'brur rton pa yin //

original: ru tsa ka me la ni ye shes rton //
analyzed: ru tsa ka me la ni ye shes rton //

original: keng rus ma ni rnam shes rton pa yin //
analyzed: keng rus ma ni rnam shes rton pa yin //
translated: and Kaṅkāla, which is the reliance on consciousness.🔽In the east, north, west,

analyzed: shar dang byang dang nub dang ni // lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor lo la //
translated: and south,

original: chos kyi mdo ni bzhi po dgod //
analyzed: chos kyi mdo ni bzhi po dgod //

original: h'um ni / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o //
analyzed: h'um ni / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o //

original: phat ni / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: phat ni / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o //

original: da ma ri ni /
analyzed: da ma ri ni /
translated: Daṃari means:

original: chos thams cad bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag med pa'o //

original: ki li ki la ni /
analyzed: ki li ki la ni /
translated: Kiṃkiṃlā means:

original: chos thams cad zhi ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad zhi ba'o //

original: me dang bden bral rlung dang ni //🔽dbang ldan 'khor @287a *//
analyzed: me dang bden bral rlung dang ni // dbang ldan 'khor @287a *//

original: lo de dag kun //
analyzed: lo de dag kun //

original: lha mo yis ni rnam par dag /
analyzed: lha mo yis ni rnam par dag /

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po'i chos thams cad rtogs pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po'i chos thams cad rtogs pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni /

original: autpal sngon po ma'o //
analyzed: autpal sngon po ma'o //

original: chos thams cad ston pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ston pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni /

original: dran pa'i mchog go /
analyzed: dran pa'i mchog go /

original: nges par 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni /
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni /

original: gsus pa 'phyad ma'o //
analyzed: gsus pa 'phyad ma'o //

original: zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni /

original: sa ba ri ma'o //
analyzed: sa ba ri ma'o //
translated: The sabari is I am.

original: mtshams su dkyil 'khor lha mo ni //
analyzed: mtshams su dkyil 'khor lha mo ni //

original: 'di yis zur bzhi rnam par dag /
analyzed: 'di yis zur bzhi rnam par dag /

original: sgo bzhi dag tu lha mo ni //
analyzed: sgo bzhi dag tu lha mo ni //

original: gtum byed ma ste /
analyzed: gtum byed ma ste /

original: dad pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of faith is I am.🔽 The faculty of diligence is I am.🔽 The faculty of mindfulness is I am.🔽 The faculty of samādhi is I am.🔽 The faculty of wisdom is I am.🔽 The faculty of the life force is I am.

original: rol gtum ma ni /
analyzed: rol gtum ma ni /
translated: The faculty of pleasure is I am.🔽 The faculty of pain is I am.🔽 The faculty of mental satisfaction is I am.🔽 The faculty of mental dissatisfaction is I am.🔽 The faculty of equanimity is I am.🔽 The faculty of

original: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //
translated: is the faculty of diligence.

original: 'bar mchog ma ni /
analyzed: 'bar mchog ma ni /
translated: The supreme flame

original: dran pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: is the faculty of mindfulness.🔽The supreme victor

original: rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni; ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni; ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o //

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'o //
translated: are the glorious Bhagavān Vajra Heruka.

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni //
translated: The thirty-two marks

original: 'phags pa shes rab bcom ldan ma //
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab bcom ldan ma //
translated: are the noble Bhagavatī Prajñā.🔽Vajravārāhī herself

original: rdo rje phag mo nyid yin no //🔽mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo nyid yin no // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /

original: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o ////
translated: From the Tantra of the Supremely Secret Dakini, the Supreme Tantra of Clear Expression, this completes the fifty-second chapter on the meditation on the essence of the twenty-two letters.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, next, I will explain

original: dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam dag ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam dag ni //

original: 'byung ba kun gyi spyan yin te //
analyzed: 'byung ba kun gyi spyan yin te //
translated: that is the eye of all the elements,

original: rnam par snang mdzad thig tu grags //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad thig tu grags //

original: bha @287b gas khyab pa'i rim pa ni //
analyzed: bha @287b gas khyab pa'i rim pa ni //

original: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes //
analyzed: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes //

original: dus ni sna tshogs rigs su shes //
analyzed: dus ni sna tshogs rigs su shes //

original: mchod pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhan //
analyzed: mchod pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhan //

original: pu li rim padma ma'o //
analyzed: pu li rim padma ma'o //
translated: Pūrṇagiri is the lotus mandala.

original: dz'a landhar thugs 'khor lo //
analyzed: dz'a landhar thugs 'khor lo //

original: au dyan gsung gi 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: au dyan gsung gi 'khor lo ste //

original: aar bu da ni sku'i 'khor lo //
analyzed: aar bu da ni sku'i 'khor lo //

original: go da ba ri zur bzhi'o //
analyzed: go da ba ri zur bzhi'o //

analyzed: r'a me shva ra me phyogs so // de b'i koo ta bden bral yin // m'a la ba ni rlung gi zur //

analyzed: dbang ldan k'a ma r'u pa ste //

original: gra bzhi rnam par dag pa ni //
analyzed: gra bzhi rnam par dag pa ni //

analyzed: 'di la the tshom med pa yin //

analyzed: ao tre dag ni shar gyi sgo'o //

original: tri sha ku ni lho phyogs sgo //
analyzed: tri sha ku ni lho phyogs sgo //

original: ko sa la ni nub kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: ko sa la ni nub kyi sgo'o //

analyzed: ka ling+ka ni byang sgo ste // shar gyi rta babs lamp'a ka /

analyzed: k'am tsi lho yi rta babs yin //

original: hi ma la ya nub phyogs so //
analyzed: hi ma la ya nub phyogs so //

original: pre ta pu ri byang yin te //
analyzed: pre ta pu ri byang yin te //

original: gri ha de bu lha snam bu //
analyzed: gri ha de bu lha snam bu //

original: soo r'ashta ni rin chen sa //
analyzed: soo r'ashta ni rin chen sa //

original: su bar dv'i pa dra ba phyed //
analyzed: su bar dv'i pa dra ba phyed //

analyzed: na ga ra ni rda yab dang // dril bu rgyal mtshan ba dan no //

analyzed: sindhu rdo rje thig zlum po //

original: ma ru ti na sgo khyud do //
analyzed: ma ru ti na sgo khyud do //

analyzed: ku lu t'a ni rdo rje dang // rin po che dang dkyil 'khor gyi //

analyzed: thig ni bla na med pa yin // zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //

analyzed: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan // dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan cing //

analyzed: dar dang phred bas rnam par brgyan //

analyzed: zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //

analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing //

analyzed: sku yi 'khor lo'i sku nyid ni // don yod grub pa rnam par spyod //
translated: The body of the body mandala🔽is Amoghasiddhi.

analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo 'od @288a *//

analyzed: dpag med // thugs kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pa // padma'i dbus ni rin chen 'dzin //

original: phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ni //
analyzed: phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ni //

original: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsgom //

original: tshor ba sku yi 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: tshor ba sku yi 'khor lo ste //

original: 'du shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin //
analyzed: 'du shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin //

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de //

original: rnam shes padma gdon mi za //
analyzed: rnam shes padma gdon mi za //

original: ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa //

analyzed: de yis rnam dag rang bzhin can // sa dang ri mo thams cad kun //

original: dpa' bos yongs su dag par bsgom //
analyzed: dpa' bos yongs su dag par bsgom //

original: ri mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa //
analyzed: ri mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa //

original: de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag /
analyzed: de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag /
translated: are completely pure for the hero.

original: 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /
analyzed: 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /
translated: The wheel is pure with the dakinis,

original: lte bar phag mo'i sa bon ksha //
analyzed: lte bar phag mo'i sa bon ksha //
translated: and the syllable kṣa of Vārāhī is in the center.

original: he ru ka dpal mchog yin no //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal mchog yin no //
translated: This is the supreme Heruka.

original: 'dab ma mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /
analyzed: 'dab ma mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /
translated: The petals are pure with the dakinis,🔽and the supreme maṇḍala maṇḍala

original: dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni; ;sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni; ;sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /
translated: is pure with the thirty-seven.

original: dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdus na //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdus na //
translated: The essence of the maṇḍala is summarized:

original: dkyil 'khor dang po yi ge ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dang po yi ge ste //

original: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa phyag mtshan yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa phyag mtshan yin //
translated: the second maṇḍala is the implement,

original: gsum pa lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad //
analyzed: gsum pa lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad //
translated: the third is explained as the hand gesture,

original: bzhi pa gzugs su gyur pa ste //
analyzed: bzhi pa gzugs su gyur pa ste //
translated: and the fourth is the form.

original: lnga pa me tog mchod pa yin //
analyzed: lnga pa me tog mchod pa yin //

original: drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //

original: dbus ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
analyzed: dbus ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //

original: padma'i lte ba dang bcas pa; ;thugs kyi 'khor lo dri ma med //🔽gsung gi 'khor lo 'od byed pa //🔽sku yi 'khor lo 'od byed pa //
analyzed: padma'i lte ba dang bcas pa; ;thugs kyi 'khor lo dri ma med // gsung gi 'khor lo 'od byed pa // sku yi 'khor lo 'od byed pa //
translated: is the stage of Stainless.🔽The stage of Luminous is the speech maṇḍala.

original: sku yi 'khor lo 'od 'phro ba //
analyzed: sku yi 'khor lo 'od 'phro ba //
translated: The stage of Radiating is the body maṇḍala.

original: zur bzhi pa ni sbyang dka' ba //🔽ring du song ba sgo @288b bzhi yin //
analyzed: zur bzhi pa ni sbyang dka' ba // ring du song ba sgo @288b bzhi yin //
translated: The stage of Difficult to Purify is the four corners.🔽The stage of Gone Afar is the four doors.

original: zur gyi cha ni mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: zur gyi cha ni mi g-yo ba //

original: legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i theg /
analyzed: legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i theg /

original: chos kyi sbrin ni rta babs yin //
analyzed: chos kyi sbrin ni rta babs yin //

original: 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
analyzed: 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
translated: Having drawn such a maṇḍala,

original: rtag tu bsgom zhing mchod par bya //
analyzed: rtag tu bsgom zhing mchod par bya //

original: dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur //🔽sdom pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa yi //
analyzed: dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur // sdom pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa yi //

original: dkyil 'khor mchog gi de nyid ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor mchog gi de nyid ni //
translated: is the reality of the supreme samādhi.

original: he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog /
analyzed: he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog /

original: bha ga'i padma'i dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: bha ga'i padma'i dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: is the maṇḍala of the bhaga lotus.🔽The supreme body of Vārāhī

original: phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa //
translated: is the supreme maṇḍala.

original: de ni dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ste //
analyzed: de ni dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ste //

original: dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin no //

original: dkyil 'khor dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma //

analyzed: gnyis med kha sbyor dkyil 'khor yin //

original: bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin //
analyzed: bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin //

original: lha yi de nyid de bzhin te //
analyzed: lha yi de nyid de bzhin te //

original: sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya yin //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya yin //

original: de lta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog /
analyzed: de lta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog /

original: yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing //
analyzed: yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing //

original: rtog dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs //
analyzed: rtog dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs //

original: phyi mo'i thig le las 'das shing //
analyzed: phyi mo'i thig le las 'das shing //
translated: It is beyond the bindu of the mother,

original: de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
analyzed: de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
translated: and that is the supreme maṇḍala.

original: chos rnams thams cad rtag tu med //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad rtag tu med //

original: chos dang chos min rnam par spyod //
analyzed: chos dang chos min rnam par spyod //

original: de lta'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni //
analyzed: de lta'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni //

original: rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa //
analyzed: rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa //
translated: is the same as pure space.

original: chags dang chags med chags par mnyam //
analyzed: chags dang chags med chags par mnyam //

original: padma r'a ga chu mnyam byung //
analyzed: padma r'a ga chu mnyam byung //

original: rang sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog /
analyzed: rang sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog /
