original: de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te //
analyzed: de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te //
translated: Are the supreme maṇḍala.

original: yid ni khams rnams thams cad de //
analyzed: yid ni khams rnams thams cad de //
translated: The mind is all the elements,

original: gzugs dang gzugs med dri ma med //🔽bskul zhing sad pa yid @289a *//
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med dri ma med // bskul zhing sad pa yid @289a *//
translated: Formless and stainless.

original: yin te; ;sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin //
analyzed: yin te; ;sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin //
translated: The mind is the maṇḍala of the mind.

original: dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste //
translated: The maṇḍala is explained as the body,

original: dkyil 'khor bha ga yin par bshad //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bha ga yin par bshad //
translated: And the maṇḍala is explained as the bhaga.

original: dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yin te //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yin te //
translated: The maṇḍala is bodhicitta,

original: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba //
translated: Which pervades the animate and inanimate,

original: sa 'og sa steng sa blar khyab //
analyzed: sa 'og sa steng sa blar khyab //
translated: The underworld, earth, and sky.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las //
translated: From the Tantra of the Supremely Secret Oral Instructions of the Ḍākinī, this

original: dkyil 'khor gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o ////
translated: completes the thirteenth chapter on the explanation of the maṇḍala.

original: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba //
translated: Then, the secret will be explained,

original: sems can kun la phan stsol ba //
analyzed: sems can kun la phan stsol ba //
translated: Which bestows benefit to all sentient beings.

original: a'a li k'a li las byung ba //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li las byung ba //
translated: Arisen from ālikāli,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog /🔽dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog / dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa //
translated: The supreme city of the dharmadhātu,🔽Adorned with nets and half-nets,

original: dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: Ornamented with silk and garlands,

original: de yi dbus su rdo rje che //
analyzed: de yi dbus su rdo rje che //
translated: In the center of that is the great vajra,

original: zhal bzhi pa la rnam par 'gyur //
analyzed: zhal bzhi pa la rnam par 'gyur //
translated: He has four faces and is wrathful.

original: de la lte ba'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: de la lte ba'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the middle of the navel

original: sna tshogs 'khor lo lte bar bcas //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'khor lo lte bar bcas //
translated: is a variegated wheel with a hub.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa ste //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa ste //
translated: The heart wheel has eight spokes,

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
translated: in the middle of which is a sun maṇḍala.

original: 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus dag tu //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus dag tu //
translated: In the middle of the hub of the wheel

original: sna tshogs padma 'dab brgyad pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma 'dab brgyad pa //
translated: is an eight-petaled variegated lotus,

original: sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam 'dres pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam 'dres pa //
translated: variegated with a vajra cross.

original: lha yi bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa //
analyzed: lha yi bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa //
translated: The twenty-four abodes of the deities

original: lte ba'i dbus su bstan pa ste //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su bstan pa ste //
translated: are explained in the middle of the navel.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
translated: In the middle of a sun maṇḍala,

original: h'um las he ru kar byas te //
analyzed: h'um las he ru kar byas te //
translated: from hūṃ, one becomes Heruka,

original: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa //
analyzed: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa //
translated: with four faces and eight arms,

original: spyan gsum sku lus dkar po ste //
analyzed: spyan gsum sku lus dkar po ste //
translated: with three eyes, and a white body.

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas //🔽phag mo yi ni ku tsha'ang 'tshir //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas // phag mo yi ni ku tsha'ang 'tshir //
translated: Holding a vajra and a bell,🔽he embraces Vārāhī with his left.

original: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
translated: He wears an upper garment of tiger skin

original: phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan //🔽gdug pa kun gyi @289b klad pa la //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan // gdug pa kun gyi @289b klad pa la //
translated: and is adorned with the six mudras.🔽He presses down on the head

original: g-yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis mnan //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis mnan //
translated: of all evildoers with his right leg extended.

original: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /
analyzed: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /
translated: Bhairava and Kālarātri

original: brgyal zhing rnam par myos pa yis //
analyzed: brgyal zhing rnam par myos pa yis //
translated: are fainting and stupefied,

original: klad pa la ni zhabs kyis mnan //
analyzed: klad pa la ni zhabs kyis mnan //
translated: their heads are being trampled by feet,

original: gcer 'o dod 'bod pa mnan //
analyzed: gcer 'o dod 'bod pa mnan //
translated: and they are being trampled by the wailing.

original: rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste //🔽lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin pa dang // gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste // lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin pa dang // gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te //
translated: The Victor is on the skin,🔽holding a goad in his hand, and also a ḍamaru,

original: thod pa kha tv'am ga yang 'dzin //
analyzed: thod pa kha tv'am ga yang 'dzin //
translated: and likewise a skull and khaṭvāṅga.

original: gzhan du yang ni mgo bo 'chang //
analyzed: gzhan du yang ni mgo bo 'chang //
translated: He also holds a head,

original: sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan //
translated: and his head is being trampled by a vajra cross.

original: zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'chang //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'chang //
translated: He holds a half-moon on his head,

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
translated: and has a crown of a garland of skulls.

original: mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug 'ching //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug 'ching //
translated: Akṣobhya is tied to his head-dress,

original: tshangs pa'i do shal 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i do shal 'dzin pa ste //
translated: and he holds a brahma-thread.

original: bdag gi khro bo bdun spros nas //
analyzed: bdag gi khro bo bdun spros nas //
translated: Having emanated my seven wrathful ones,

original: ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du //
translated: just like the color of the Bhagavān,

original: phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te //
analyzed: phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te //
translated: so too is the supreme Vārāhī,

original: sku lus nag po dmar ba'i mdangs //
analyzed: sku lus nag po dmar ba'i mdangs //
translated: with a black body and a reddish glow,

original: gzi byin mdangs kyis mdzes pa ste //
analyzed: gzi byin mdangs kyis mdzes pa ste //
translated: beautiful with radiant luster,

original: gri gug thod pa kha tv'am ga /
analyzed: gri gug thod pa kha tv'am ga /
translated: holding a flaying knife, skull cup, and khaṭvāṅga.

original: dril bu cang te'u mdung dang ni //
analyzed: dril bu cang te'u mdung dang ni //
translated: A bell, a small drum, a spear,

original: lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhin no //
translated: and a hook and a noose as well.

original: lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste //
analyzed: lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste //
translated: The goddess has eight arms,

original: dkar zhing sngo la ljang ba'o //
analyzed: dkar zhing sngo la ljang ba'o //
translated: white, blue, and green.

original: steng gi zhal ni dmar po mdzes //
analyzed: steng gi zhal ni dmar po mdzes //
translated: The upper face is beautiful and red,

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gdong ni //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gdong ni //
translated: the right and left faces

original: ser zhing ljang ba'i gzugs can te //
analyzed: ser zhing ljang ba'i gzugs can te //
translated: are yellow and green.

original: gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin du //
analyzed: gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin du //
translated: Otherwise, she is like the lord.

original: phag mo yang ni de bzhin gyur //🔽gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste //
analyzed: phag mo yang ni de bzhin gyur // gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste //
translated: Vārāhī is the same way.🔽Naked, with loose hair,

original: ma nyams dum bu'i ska rags can //
analyzed: ma nyams dum bu'i ska rags can //
translated: not spoiled, with a skirt of strips,

original: padma bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: padma bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: the dakinis are on the four lotuses.

original: zur la bum pa thod pa ste //
analyzed: zur la bum pa thod pa ste //
translated: At the corners are the vases and skulls.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: The mind wheel was explained before.

original: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma de @290a *//
analyzed: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma de @290a *//
translated: The heroes and dakinis🔽are like that.

original: bzhin // gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis //
analyzed: bzhin // gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis //
translated: The two wheels of speech and body

original: shar dang byang nub lho ru'o //
analyzed: shar dang byang nub lho ru'o //
translated: are in the east, north, west, and south.

original: sgo rnams su ni sgo srung ste //
analyzed: sgo rnams su ni sgo srung ste //
translated: At the doors are the door guardians,

original: khva gdong la sogs thams cad do //
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs thams cad do //
translated: all of them, Kākāsyā and so forth.

original: zur la gshin rje sreg la sogs //
analyzed: zur la gshin rje sreg la sogs //
translated: At the corners are Yama, Agni, and so forth.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par ni //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par ni //
translated: The special features are as desired.

original: rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste //
translated: The Vajra Essence explains.

original: kha cig rnal 'byor ma ru 'dod //
analyzed: kha cig rnal 'byor ma ru 'dod //
translated: Some assert it is the Yoginī.

original: bla ma'i gnas kyi rjes rim pa //
analyzed: bla ma'i gnas kyi rjes rim pa //
translated: The stages of the guru’s abode

original: sngar bshad sna tshogs rigs rnams ni //
analyzed: sngar bshad sna tshogs rigs rnams ni //
translated: are the various families explained above.

original: ji ltar 'dod pas bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pas bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on them as one wishes.

original: gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni //
translated: Moreover, the faces and colors

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi mdog bzhin dang // phyag mtshan phyag rgyar sngar bshad bzhin //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi mdog bzhin dang // phyag mtshan phyag rgyar sngar bshad bzhin //
translated: are like the colors of the ḍākinīs, and the hand implements are as explained above.

original: gnas sogs rim pa de ltar dgod //
analyzed: gnas sogs rim pa de ltar dgod //
translated: The stages of the abode and so on are arranged in that way.

original: sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin //
translated: As explained above,

original: gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod //
analyzed: gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod //
translated: the mantra is arranged in stages.

original: sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don //
translated: The meaning of the thirty-seven

original: sgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya //
translated: is the supreme meditation.

original: a'a li k'a li'i nang byung ba //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i nang byung ba //
translated: It arises from the ālikāli

original: sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya //
translated: and should be meditated and contemplated.

original: chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par //
analyzed: chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par //
translated: In the pure city of the realm of reality,

original: sems can khams ni rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: sems can khams ni rab tu 'jug /
translated: the realm of sentient beings is fully engaged.

original: rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste //
translated: This yoga is secret

original: su la yang ni bstan mi bya //
analyzed: su la yang ni bstan mi bya //
translated: and should not be shown to anyone.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las //
translated: In the Tantra of the Supreme Secret of Supreme Speech.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the forty-fourth chapter of the Dharma Realm, the City of the Mandala, in the Tantra of the Supreme Secret of Supreme Speech.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: bha ga padma sgom pa ni //
analyzed: bha ga padma sgom pa ni //
translated: the meditation on the bhaga lotus.

original: rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las //
translated: In the Questions of Vajra Essence,

original: bcom ldan @290b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan @290b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: the Blessed One said:

original: yang dag gsang ba nges gsang ba //
analyzed: yang dag gsang ba nges gsang ba //
translated: The true secret, the secret of certainty,

original: a'a li k'a li zur gsum gnas //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zur gsum gnas //
translated: is the triangular abode of the vowels and consonants.

original: padma 'dab gsum rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: padma 'dab gsum rnam par bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the three-petaled lotus.

original: rdo rje phag mo he ru ka /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo he ru ka /
translated: Vajravārāhī Heruka

original: lte ba la ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: lte ba la ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: is meditated on in the center.🔽Vajraḍākinī, Lāmā,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro l'a ma dang // gsum pa dum skyes ma nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro l'a ma dang // gsum pa dum skyes ma nyid do //
translated: and Khaṇḍarohā herself.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni dmar la sngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni dmar la sngo //
translated: The Blessed One is red and blue,

original: phag mo yang ni dmar sngo ste //
analyzed: phag mo yang ni dmar sngo ste //
translated: and Vārāhī is also red and blue.🔽Ḍākinī is blue and yellow,

original: mkha' 'gro sngo la ser ba dang // l'a ma ljang la ser ba ste //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro sngo la ser ba dang // l'a ma ljang la ser ba ste //
translated: and Lāmā is green and yellow.

original: dum skyes ma ni dmar la ser //
analyzed: dum skyes ma ni dmar la ser //
translated: Khaṇḍarohā is red and yellow.

original: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
analyzed: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
translated: They have one face and four arms.

original: bcom ldan mgon po zhal bzhi pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan mgon po zhal bzhi pa //
translated: The Blessed Lord has four faces.

original: zhabs bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa //
analyzed: zhabs bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa //
translated: He has four feet and four hands,

original: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
translated: holding a skull and a khaṭvāṅga,

original: dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshon //
analyzed: dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshon //
translated: and is well-marked with a vajra and a bell.

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
translated: He has a head ornament of a garland of skulls,

original: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste //
translated: and is marked with a crossed vajra.

original: zhi ba zla ba phyed pa 'chang //
analyzed: zhi ba zla ba phyed pa 'chang //
translated: He holds a half-moon, peaceful,

original: mi 'khrugs pa ni spyi gtsug 'ching //
analyzed: mi 'khrugs pa ni spyi gtsug 'ching //
translated: and has a topknot of hair.

original: rtag par gsang ba'i gos mnabs shing //
analyzed: rtag par gsang ba'i gos mnabs shing //
translated: He is always dressed in secret garments,

original: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: and is adorned with a garland of skulls.

original: phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin te /
analyzed: phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin te /
translated: This is the sign of the face of Vārāhī.

original: byi pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing //
analyzed: byi pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing //
translated: He is well-embraced by two boars,

original: gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la //
analyzed: gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la //
translated: naked, with loose hair,

original: spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'khril //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'khril //
translated: with three eyes, and is well-passionate.

original: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid //🔽zhabs kyis rnam par gnon pa ste //
analyzed: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid // zhabs kyis rnam par gnon pa ste //
translated: He tramples Bhairava and Kālarātri🔽with his feet.

original: g-yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs //
translated: He stands in the posture of right leg extended,

original: sku lus phyag rgya drug 'jin cing //
analyzed: sku lus phyag rgya drug 'jin cing //
translated: with a body holding the six mudras,

original: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang // thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos //
analyzed: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang // thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos //
translated: with bared fangs, and is intoxicated with compassionate passion.

original: g-yas pa dkar zhing g-yon @291a *//
analyzed: g-yas pa dkar zhing g-yon @291a *//
translated: The right is white,🔽and the left is green.

original: ljang gu; ;steng ni sngo skya sku lus dkar //🔽gzugs can ma ni bha gar brtag /
analyzed: ljang gu; ;steng ni sngo skya sku lus dkar // gzugs can ma ni bha gar brtag /
translated: The upper part is pale blue, and the body is white.🔽One should imagine the bhaga of Rūpiṇī.

original: a'a li k'a li bha ga'i mchog /
analyzed: a'a li k'a li bha ga'i mchog /
translated: The bhaga is the supreme ālikāli.🔽Moreover, in the center of the three corners,

original: gzhan yang zur gsum dbus dag  tu; ;padma'i 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: gzhan yang zur gsum dbus dag  tu; ;padma'i 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
translated: one should visualize the lotus wheel.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the mind wheel,

original: sna tshogs padma dag tu brtag /
analyzed: sna tshogs padma dag tu brtag /
translated: one should imagine a variegated lotus.

original: dbus su he ru ka phag mo //
analyzed: dbus su he ru ka phag mo //
translated: In the center is Heruka and Vārāhī,

original: 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs dgod //
analyzed: 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs dgod //
translated: and on the petals one should place the ḍākinīs and so forth.

original: zur du thod pa dkar po dag /
analyzed: zur du thod pa dkar po dag /
translated: In the corners are white skulls.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod //
translated: The mind wheel is the sky-farers.

original: shar gyi zur la sku 'khor lo //
analyzed: shar gyi zur la sku 'khor lo //
translated: In the eastern corner is the body wheel.

original: rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la //
analyzed: rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la //
translated: In the wheel in the corner of the wind

original: khva gdong la sogs rnam brgyad do //
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs rnam brgyad do //
translated: are the eight, such as Kākāsyā.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo bden bral zur //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo bden bral zur //
translated: The speech wheel is in the corner of Rākṣasa.

original: 'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la //
translated: In the three corners of the four wheels,

original: shar ni sku yi mkha' 'gro ste //
analyzed: shar ni sku yi mkha' 'gro ste //
translated: the east is the body ḍākinī,

original: rlung phyogs gshin rje'i mkha' 'gro'o //
analyzed: rlung phyogs gshin rje'i mkha' 'gro'o //
translated: the wind direction is the yāminī ḍākinī,

original: bden bral gsung gi mkha' 'gro ste //
analyzed: bden bral gsung gi mkha' 'gro ste //
translated: Rākṣasa is the speech ḍākinī,

original: dbus su rdo rje he ru ka /
analyzed: dbus su rdo rje he ru ka /
translated: and in the center is Vajra Heruka.

original: sngo zhing dkar po dud ka dang // sngo zhing dmar ba bzhi po yin //
analyzed: sngo zhing dkar po dud ka dang // sngo zhing dmar ba bzhi po yin //
translated: blue and red, are the four.

original: rang gi phyag mtshan mnyam par ldan //
analyzed: rang gi phyag mtshan mnyam par ldan //
translated: They are endowed with their own hand implements.

original: gzhan du rang bdag mdog de bzhin //
analyzed: gzhan du rang bdag mdog de bzhin //
translated: Otherwise, they are the same color as their lords.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: The ḍākinīs of the mind wheel

original: dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam //
analyzed: dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam //
translated: are imagined to be red.

original: dpa' bo'i mdog ni nag po la //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i mdog ni nag po la //
translated: The heroes are black,

original: gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: united in the embrace of nonduality.

original: sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dag /
analyzed: sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dag /
translated: The heroes of the body wheel

original: sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam //
analyzed: sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam //
translated: are imagined to have white bodies.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog /
translated: The ḍākinīs are yellow,

original: dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor //
analyzed: dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor //
translated: united with the two heroes.

original: khva @291b gdong gshin rje brtan la sogs //
analyzed: khva @291b gdong gshin rje brtan la sogs //
translated: Kāṇḍa-mukha, Yama-dāntī, and so on,

original: gzugs gnyis phyed ni bud med nyid //
analyzed: gzugs gnyis phyed ni bud med nyid //
translated: are half female.

original: rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu //
translated: Together with their method,

original: dgyes shing chags pas rnam par myos //
analyzed: dgyes shing chags pas rnam par myos //
translated: they are delighted and intoxicated with passion.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar //
translated: The heroes of the speech wheel are red,

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni ljang gu'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni ljang gu'o //
translated: and the ḍākinīs are green.

original: sngar bshad rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams //
analyzed: sngar bshad rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams //
translated: The signs explained previously

original: de yang rigs kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: de yang rigs kyi dbye bas so //
translated: are also divided by family.

original: thams cad yi dvags gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad yi dvags gdan la bzhugs //
translated: All of them sit on seats of pretas,

original: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with garlands of heads.

original: thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing //
analyzed: thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing //
translated: All of them hold the five symbolic ornaments,

original: phyag rgya drug gis bdag po dgod //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis bdag po dgod //
translated: and the lord has the six symbolic ornaments.

original: thams cad rang rigs cod pan can //
analyzed: thams cad rang rigs cod pan can //
translated: All of them have crowns of their own kind,

original: ji lta ba yi rim pas bsgom //
analyzed: ji lta ba yi rim pas bsgom //
translated: and one should meditate in the proper sequence.🔽Having meditated on the proper sequence

original: mkha' 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor ba yis //🔽ji lta'i rjes su rnam bsgoms nas //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor ba yis // ji lta'i rjes su rnam bsgoms nas //
translated: through the practice of the ḍākinīs’ time,

original: go cha'i gsang sngags dgod par bya //
analyzed: go cha'i gsang sngags dgod par bya //
translated: one should recite the secret mantra of the armor.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa dag /🔽sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yi //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa dag / sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yi //
translated: The stages of body, speech, and mind🔽are the limbs of the hero, meditated in sequence

original: dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa bsgom //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa bsgom //
translated: through the application of the previously explained ritual.

original: gsang zhing sba ba'i zhi gnas ni //
analyzed: gsang zhing sba ba'i zhi gnas ni //
translated: The secret and concealed tranquility

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi bde 'khor lo //🔽rtag tu mnyam par bzhag nas su //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi bde 'khor lo // rtag tu mnyam par bzhag nas su //
translated: is the wheel of bliss of the ḍākinīs.🔽Always equipoised,

original: sbyor ba'i mchog ni rtag tu bsgom //🔽'di ni su la'ang mi bstan te //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i mchog ni rtag tu bsgom // 'di ni su la'ang mi bstan te //
translated: one should always meditate on the supreme practice.🔽This should not be shown to anyone

original: de nyid su la'ang brjod mi bya //🔽dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag /
analyzed: de nyid su la'ang brjod mi bya // dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag /
translated: and should not be spoken to anyone.🔽If one always meditates on the practice

original: rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: of the union of the two organs, there will be spiritual power.

original: dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing //
analyzed: dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing //
translated: One should always keep the commitments,

original: bza' dang bca' ba'ang spyad par bya //🔽'gro zhing 'gro zhing dus kun tu //
analyzed: bza' dang bca' ba'ang spyad par bya // 'gro zhing 'gro zhing dus kun tu //
translated: And also enjoy the food and drink.🔽One should always practice

original: 'char nub dag tu rnam par spyad //🔽gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa //
analyzed: 'char nub dag tu rnam par spyad // gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa //
translated: At dawn and dusk, while going and going.🔽The mantra practitioner who listens to this wisdom

original: sngags pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur //🔽mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: sngags pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: Will quickly be successful.

original: gsang @292a *// ba sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: gsang @292a *// ba sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the chapter on the meditation of the secret union, the fifty-fifth chapter of the Tantra of the Supreme Original Buddha.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: gsang ba'i ye shes mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: gsang ba'i ye shes mchog gyur pa //
translated: The supreme secret wisdom,

original: rigs lnga gsang sngags rgya che ba'i //
analyzed: rigs lnga gsang sngags rgya che ba'i //
translated: The meditation of the extensive mantra of the five families

original: sgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yin //🔽log pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can //
analyzed: sgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yin // log pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can //
translated: That I have taught.🔽You should not explain it

original: gang la'ang khyod kyis bshad mi bya //
analyzed: gang la'ang khyod kyis bshad mi bya //
translated: To anyone with a consciousness of wrong understanding.🔽It should be taught just as it is taught

original: bla ma'i rim las ji ltar bstan //
analyzed: bla ma'i rim las ji ltar bstan //
translated: In the stages of the guru.

original: gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba //
translated: By whom it will be quickly understood.

original: skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu //
analyzed: skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu //
translated: For a thousand million rebirths

original: sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing //
translated: One is urged by the wisdom of the magical display.

original: dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang // rnal 'byor spyod tshul gnas pa yin //
analyzed: dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang // rnal 'byor spyod tshul gnas pa yin //
translated: And those who abide in the conduct of yoga.

original: lkug cing glen la sdig ngan can //
analyzed: lkug cing glen la sdig ngan can //
translated: Those who are mute, stupid, and sinful,

original: byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can //
analyzed: byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can //
translated: Those who have the consciousness of childish understanding,🔽Those sentient beings who are not ripened,

original: sems can yongs su ma smin dang // phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'tshal ba //
analyzed: sems can yongs su ma smin dang // phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'tshal ba //
translated: And those who are known by the outer treatises,

original: de dag kun gyis mi shes te //
analyzed: de dag kun gyis mi shes te //
translated: All of them do not know this.🔽Those who are covered by the darkness of ignorance,

original: mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang // khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'//
analyzed: mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang // khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'//
translated: And those who always delight in arrogance,

original: nga rgyal la sogs gdug sems ldan //🔽de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi //
analyzed: nga rgyal la sogs gdug sems ldan // de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi //
translated: Those who have a malicious mind of pride and so forth,🔽All of them do not know

original: spyod yul gsang ba mi shes so //🔽he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug /
analyzed: spyod yul gsang ba mi shes so // he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug /
translated: The secret domain of the buddhas.🔽The great master who has entered

original: slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis //
analyzed: slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis //
translated: The perfect state of glorious Heruka

original: myur du dngos grub skyed byed de //
analyzed: myur du dngos grub skyed byed de //
translated: Quickly generates spiritual powers

original: 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin //
analyzed: 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin //
translated: And immediately inspires confidence.

original: sna tshogs sdom pa shes pa yis //
analyzed: sna tshogs sdom pa shes pa yis //
translated: Those who know the various vows

original: cho ga'i bya ba bstan par bya //
analyzed: cho ga'i bya ba bstan par bya //
translated: Should be taught the ritual actions.

original: srid pa gsum po ma lus ni //
analyzed: srid pa gsum po ma lus ni //
translated: The entire three existences

original: de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes //
analyzed: de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes //
translated: Knows the teaching of the Omniscient One.

original: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran @292b pa yis; ;sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur pa //
analyzed: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran @292b pa yis; ;sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur pa //
translated: one will be liberated from all evil.

original: de ltar de ni the tshom med //
analyzed: de ltar de ni the tshom med //
translated: Thus, there is no doubt about this.🔽The gods will turn away,🔽the divisions of mantras will be averted,

original: lha rnams ldog ste bkod pa dang // sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang // dkyil 'khor kun yang bzlog pa dang; ;so so bsgom pa'ang mi bya ste //
analyzed: lha rnams ldog ste bkod pa dang // sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang // dkyil 'khor kun yang bzlog pa dang; ;so so bsgom pa'ang mi bya ste //
translated: all maṇḍalas will be averted, and one should not practice each one individually.

original: bzlog pa'i yi ge btus nas ni //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i yi ge btus nas ni //
translated: Having collected the averted syllables,

original: sgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa de //
analyzed: sgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa de //
translated: that secret meditation is averted.

original: snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin //
analyzed: snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin //
translated: It is the accomplishment of all essences.🔽The collection of all concepts and the general

original: rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang; ;rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni //
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang; ;rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni //
translated: of all tantras,

original: sems ni yongs su smin pa dag /🔽'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi //
analyzed: sems ni yongs su smin pa dag / 'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi //
translated: the complete ripening of the mind,🔽is taught here.

original: dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin //
analyzed: dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin //
translated: Here, the commitments of the mantras such as yoga and so forth🔽are taught in that way.

original: bde gshegs dbugs 'byin gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: bde gshegs dbugs 'byin gsungs pa yin //
translated: It is the exhalation of the Sugata.

original: dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa //
analyzed: dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa //
translated: The pure body is flawless.

original: bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang //
analyzed: bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang //
translated: Even a mantra practitioner with little merit

original: nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur //
translated: will attain it through my joy.

original: de na bsrung med bza' ba med //
analyzed: de na bsrung med bza' ba med //
translated: There is no protection, no food,

original: dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor bdag po med //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor bdag po med //
translated: No maṇḍala, no maṇḍalācārya,

original: bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin sreg med //
analyzed: bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin sreg med //
translated: No repetition, no observances, no fire offerings,

original: mdor na sems bsdus tshul can yin //
analyzed: mdor na sems bsdus tshul can yin //
translated: In brief, it is the way of the collected mind.

original: gzung byas rnam shes ye shes ni //
analyzed: gzung byas rnam shes ye shes ni //
translated: The wisdom of consciousness is apprehended

original: bla mas bstan las brtson las te; ;phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos la //
analyzed: bla mas bstan las brtson las te; ;phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos la //
translated: From the effort of the guru’s teaching,

original: lam de shin tu ring ba yin //
analyzed: lam de shin tu ring ba yin //
translated: But the path is very long🔽In the treatises of the outsiders.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni //
translated: The yogis, through skillful means,

original: bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa //
analyzed: bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa //
translated: Are diligent in serving the guru.🔽The characteristics of the teacher are taught,

original: ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang; ;dpa' ba'i de nyid bstan pa yin //
analyzed: ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang; ;dpa' ba'i de nyid bstan pa yin //
translated: And the reality of the hero is revealed.

original: skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag /
analyzed: skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag /
translated: The yogi of the moment

original: skad cag rnam par phyag rgyar ldan //
analyzed: skad cag rnam par phyag rgyar ldan //
translated: Is endowed with the seal of the moment.

original: kun nas thams cad skad cig ste //🔽skad cig gis ni gsang @293a *//
analyzed: kun nas thams cad skad cig ste // skad cig gis ni gsang @293a *//
translated: Everything is completely momentary,🔽And the mantra is uttered in a moment.

original: sngags brjod // pus mos la btsugs nas su //
analyzed: sngags brjod // pus mos la btsugs nas su //
translated: Kneeling on the knees,

original: bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gdab //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gdab //
translated: One should supplicate oneself.

original: bcom ldan lha mos zhus pa ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan lha mos zhus pa ni //
translated: The Bhagavān, in the Tantra Requested by the Goddess,

original: go 'phang rgya che gnyis med pa //
analyzed: go 'phang rgya che gnyis med pa //
translated: Taught the nondual, vast stage:

original: 'di ni 'byung po kun la gnas //
analyzed: 'di ni 'byung po kun la gnas //
translated: This is the abode of all the bhūtas.

original: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rol //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rol //
translated: The one who moves and does not move,

original: rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni //
translated: The one who is spoken of by the vajra essence,

original: ci rigs bshad kyi legs par nyon //
analyzed: ci rigs bshad kyi legs par nyon //
translated: Is explained in the appropriate way, so listen well!

original: brtags pa'i yid kyis gzung bar gyis //
analyzed: brtags pa'i yid kyis gzung bar gyis //
translated: You should hold it with your discriminating mind.

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par //
translated: The one who always abides in all of them

original: gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid //
analyzed: gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid //
translated: Is the one who was previously explained.

original: dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad //
translated: The maṇḍala is explained to be the body.

original: de ni sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur //
translated: It is the nine doors.

original: de la lte ba'i 'khor lo che //
analyzed: de la lte ba'i 'khor lo che //
translated: The great navel cakra

original: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad //
translated: Is explained to be omniscience.

original: rdo rje can ni der zhugs pa //
analyzed: rdo rje can ni der zhugs pa //
translated: The one who possesses the vajra enters there.

original: cha med cha ni rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: cha med cha ni rnam spangs pa //
translated: The partless one abandons parts.

original: lus can rnams kyi nang na rol //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi nang na rol //
translated: He moves among embodied beings.

original: lus las 'das shing gos pa med //
analyzed: lus las 'das shing gos pa med //
translated: He transcends the body and is unstained.

original: la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs //
translated: In some places he abides in form.🔽In some places he is the nose and tongue,🔽In some places he is sound in the ears,

original: la lar sna dang dag dag dang // la lar rna bar sgra dag dang // la lar dri chen rdo rje chu //
analyzed: la lar sna dang dag dag dang // la lar rna bar sgra dag dang // la lar dri chen rdo rje chu //
translated: In some places he is feces and vajra water.

original: la lar tshor bar bcas pa'i sems //
analyzed: la lar tshor bar bcas pa'i sems //
translated: In some places he is the mind with feelings.

original: la lar sgom dang la lar bkres //
analyzed: la lar sgom dang la lar bkres //
translated: In some places he is meditation and in some places he is hunger.

original: la lar khro dang la lar zhi //
analyzed: la lar khro dang la lar zhi //
translated: To some he is wrathful, to some he is peaceful.

original: la lar bde la rnam par gzigs //
analyzed: la lar bde la rnam par gzigs //
translated: To some he is seen as blissful,

original: la lar bud med 'dod chags te //🔽la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste //
analyzed: la lar bud med 'dod chags te // la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste //
translated: To some he is lustful as a woman,🔽To some he is killing and destroying,

original: la lar rol mo rdung bar mdzad //
analyzed: la lar rol mo rdung bar mdzad //
translated: To some he is playing and beating,

original: la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas //
analyzed: la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas //
translated: To some he abides as flowers and fruits,

original: la lar rol cing spyod @293b par 'gyur //
analyzed: la lar rol cing spyod @293b par 'gyur //
translated: To some he is enjoying and engaging,

original: la lar srog tu rnam par gnas //
analyzed: la lar srog tu rnam par gnas //
translated: To some he abides as life,

original: la lar sa dang chu dang me //
analyzed: la lar sa dang chu dang me //
translated: To some he is earth, water, and fire,

original: la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga //
analyzed: la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga //
translated: To some he is the five great elements,

original: la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis //
analyzed: la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis //
translated: To some, by the distinctions of caste,

original: bram ze dang ni gdol pa dang // la lar ma dang sring mo ru //
analyzed: bram ze dang ni gdol pa dang // la lar ma dang sring mo ru //
translated: He is a Brahmin, an outcaste, to some a mother, to some a sister,

original: la lar chung ma bu mo ru //
analyzed: la lar chung ma bu mo ru //
translated: To some he is a wife and daughter,🔽To some he is Brahma, Indra,

original: la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang // khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid //🔽la lar zla ba skar mar bcas //
analyzed: la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang // khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid // la lar zla ba skar mar bcas //
translated: Vishnu, and the sun itself,🔽To some he is the moon with the stars,

original: la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur //
analyzed: la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur //
translated: To some he is day and night,

original: la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun //
analyzed: la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun //
translated: To some he is all in the three realms,

original: byed pa po dang mi zad rgyal //
analyzed: byed pa po dang mi zad rgyal //
translated: The creator and the imperishable victor.

original: la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum //
analyzed: la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum //
translated: To some, by the power of peace, he is depressed,

original: mi gsal stong pa'i rdo rje can //
analyzed: mi gsal stong pa'i rdo rje can //
translated: To some he is the vajra of empty non-clarity.

original: la lar byang chub chen por gshegs //
analyzed: la lar byang chub chen por gshegs //
translated: To some he goes to great enlightenment.

original: la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal //
analyzed: la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal //
translated: To some he conquers the enemy at the end.

original: la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: To some he is the nature of a child.

original: la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o //
analyzed: la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o //
translated: To some he is old and decrepit.

original: la lar nad chen gyis zin pa //
analyzed: la lar nad chen gyis zin pa //
translated: To some he is seized by a great illness.

original: la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
analyzed: la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
translated: To some he is moving and not moving.🔽To some he is blue and red,

original: la lar sngo dang le brgan dang // la lar dkar dang ser ba'o //
analyzed: la lar sngo dang le brgan dang // la lar dkar dang ser ba'o //
translated: to some he is white and yellow.

original: la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //🔽la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo //
analyzed: la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad // la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo //
translated: To some he is the Buddha Vairocana.🔽To some he is Tara, Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: la lar spyan dang m'a ma k'i //
analyzed: la lar spyan dang m'a ma k'i //
translated: To some he is Locanā and Māmakī.

original: la lar dka' zlog zhi ba mo //
analyzed: la lar dka' zlog zhi ba mo //
translated: To some he is Aparājitā and Śāntidevī.

original: la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang // nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid //🔽la lar klu dang sbrul chen po //
analyzed: la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang // nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid // la lar klu dang sbrul chen po //
translated: To some he is a bird, a garuḍa, the sky, and a sky-goer.🔽To some he is a nāga and a great serpent.

original: la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni //
analyzed: la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni //
translated: To some he is a prostitute, a monkey,🔽and to some he is a dream.

original: la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang // la lar gnyid kyis log pa nas //🔽la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang // la lar @294a *//
analyzed: la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang // la lar gnyid kyis log pa nas // la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang // la lar @294a *//
translated: To some he is asleep,🔽to some he is wind, bile,

original: khrag dang pags par 'gyur //
analyzed: khrag dang pags par 'gyur //
translated: and to some he is blood and skin.

original: la lar mya ngan du ba dang // la lar sreg pa'i me dag yin //
analyzed: la lar mya ngan du ba dang // la lar sreg pa'i me dag yin //
translated: For some, it is the fire of grief.

original: la lar mtho ris skye ba ste //
analyzed: la lar mtho ris skye ba ste //
translated: For some, it is birth in the higher realms.

original: rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu //
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu //
translated: Such are the emanations.

original: thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs 'di la //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs 'di la //
translated: All of them abide in the self.

original: lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i //
analyzed: lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i //
translated: For those gods who have abandoned parts,

original: de yi sgyu ma'i sna tshogs 'di'o //
analyzed: de yi sgyu ma'i sna tshogs 'di'o //

original: rtag pa min pa rdo rje can //
analyzed: rtag pa min pa rdo rje can //
translated: The impermanent one is the vajra holder.

original: gzugs med par ni bha ga'i nang //🔽lte ba'i nang na padma che //
analyzed: gzugs med par ni bha ga'i nang // lte ba'i nang na padma che //
translated: In the formless realm, within the bhaga,🔽In the center of the navel, there is a great lotus,

original: bcu drug thig gis thig gdab par //
analyzed: bcu drug thig gis thig gdab par //

original: yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas //
analyzed: yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas //

original: kha sbyor bya ba byas pa yin //
analyzed: kha sbyor bya ba byas pa yin //

original: de dbus rtag tu gsang pa che //
analyzed: de dbus rtag tu gsang pa che //

original: 'byin dang sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'byin dang sdud par byed pa'o //

original: de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //
analyzed: de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //

original: gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha //
analyzed: gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha //
translated: The sole, self-arisen, great deity.

original: de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes //
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes //

original: mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin //
analyzed: mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin //

original: gsang ba'i mchog gi dgyes pa na //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchog gi dgyes pa na //
translated: In the supreme joy of the secret,

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //

original: thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa'am //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa'am //

original: mi 'gyur ba yi lam bshad pa //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba yi lam bshad pa //

original: skra ni nyag ma brgya yi cha //
analyzed: skra ni nyag ma brgya yi cha //

analyzed: mchog gi gzugs can bsam pa ste // stong pa ma yin dmigs su med //
translated: Of the supreme form, the thought.🔽Not empty, not an object,

analyzed: yi ge med cing stong pa'ang med //

original: gos pa med cing sa bon med //
analyzed: gos pa med cing sa bon med //

original: gzugs med mtshan ma'ang med pa ste //
analyzed: gzugs med mtshan ma'ang med pa ste //

original: rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni //
analyzed: rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni //

original: rnam shes ye shes dag tu gzung //
analyzed: rnam shes ye shes dag tu gzung //

original: thams cad gsal byed @294b sgron ma ni //
analyzed: thams cad gsal byed @294b sgron ma ni //

original: dang po'i mtshan ma dag tu blta //
analyzed: dang po'i mtshan ma dag tu blta //

original: gsal byed glog gi cha tsam ste //
analyzed: gsal byed glog gi cha tsam ste //

original: mtshan ma gnyis pa dag tu brtag /
analyzed: mtshan ma gnyis pa dag tu brtag /

analyzed: dkar po'i 'od kyi tshul can ni //

analyzed: phyogs bcu dag tu blta byas te; ;nyon mongs 'byin pa gsungs pa yin //

original: rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag /

analyzed: 'dod pa'i lha yi longs spyod ni //

original: bzhi pa rnam shes dag tu bstan //
analyzed: bzhi pa rnam shes dag tu bstan //

original: gzugs dang reg sogs lha mo ni //
analyzed: gzugs dang reg sogs lha mo ni //

original: phyogs kyi ye shes lnga po yin //
analyzed: phyogs kyi ye shes lnga po yin //

original: drug pa gzugs med ye shes te //
analyzed: drug pa gzugs med ye shes te //

analyzed: bdun pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings // brgyad par rang nyid 'dod bzhin du //
translated: and the seventh is the dharmadhātu.🔽In the eighth, the result of buddhahood

original: sangs rgyas 'bras bu dag yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'bras bu dag yin no //
translated: is just as one wishes.🔽The hidden, the look, the hand,

analyzed: sbas pa lta dang lag pa dang // 'khyud dang gnyis gnyis la sogs pa //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs //

analyzed: dgu pa bla ma bla ma ste //

analyzed: thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin //

original: rnam pa gzhan dag rtsva dang 'dra //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan dag rtsva dang 'dra //

analyzed: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /

analyzed: de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin //

original: de nyid thams cad khyab byed de //
analyzed: de nyid thams cad khyab byed de //

original: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //

original: de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te //
analyzed: de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te //

original: he ru ka dpal yin par bshad //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal yin par bshad //

original: skyes pa ma ni nga la sogs nyid //
analyzed: skyes pa ma ni nga la sogs nyid //

analyzed: phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin pa yin //

original: ye shes dag tu 'byung de la //
analyzed: ye shes dag tu 'byung de la //

analyzed: gang zhig sa la gnas rnams dang // bstan bcos dag ni ma lus dang // rig byed grub mthar gnas pa @295a *//

analyzed: rnams; ;'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu //

analyzed: de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur //

analyzed: rig byed grub pa'i mtha' rnams la //

original: 'di ni snying po rab tu bshad //
analyzed: 'di ni snying po rab tu bshad //

analyzed: 'dug dang ldang ba nyid dang ni //

analyzed: 'jug pa rdzogs pa nyid dag dang // byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa yin //
translated: and the summarized samādhi offering.🔽Then, the other name of the rite,

analyzed: de nas cho ga ming gzhan pa; ;thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa //

analyzed: de nyid du ni kun skyes pa //

analyzed: 'byin dang sdud par byed pa yin //

analyzed: aa a'a / ai a'i /

analyzed: au a'u / ri r'i/

analyzed: li l'i/ ae aee /

analyzed: ao aoo / aam aa:/

analyzed: ka kha ga gha nga /

analyzed: ta tha da dha na /
translated: ta tha da dha na /

analyzed: pa pha ba bha ma /

original: ya ra la wa /
analyzed: ya ra la wa /

analyzed: sha sha sa ha ksha: aom h'um h'um phat/

analyzed: 'di ni bcom ldan lha de yin //

original: mchog nyid lhag par gnas pa yin //
analyzed: mchog nyid lhag par gnas pa yin //
translated: who abides in the state of supreme bliss.🔽 Having generated all the gods

analyzed: lha kun gyi ni bskyed pa dang // sgrub byas de bzhin shes byas nas //

analyzed: sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas na //

analyzed: des ni 'di ni nges rgyal te //

original: dge dang mi dge gang yin pa //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge gang yin pa //

analyzed: de ni lha tshogs rgyan yin te //

original: ska rags gnas rnams thams cad yin //
analyzed: ska rags gnas rnams thams cad yin //

original: rtag tu 'di ni 'dzin byed pa //
analyzed: rtag tu 'di ni 'dzin byed pa //

analyzed: chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa yin //

analyzed: a'a li k'a li mdun bsams na //

analyzed: rnal @295b 'byor chen po ngal bsos te //

original: bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid de //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid de //

analyzed: sems kyang brtag par mi bya'o //

analyzed: sems de nyid kyang mi bsam ste //

analyzed: des na 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur //

analyzed: gang gis rgyud kun las gsang ba //

analyzed: khyod la yang ni bshad pa yin //

original: 'di ni 'bad pas sba bya ste //
analyzed: 'di ni 'bad pas sba bya ste //

original: gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i sdom //
analyzed: gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i sdom //

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang // dpa' bo'i yan lag thams cad kyi //

original: rnal 'byor pa yis 'bras bu thob //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis 'bras bu thob //

original: srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba yin //

original: bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la ni //
analyzed: bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la ni //

original: bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad //

original: gal te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing //
analyzed: gal te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing //

original: sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyang 'khor //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyang 'khor //

original: sems ni rnam 'khor rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: sems ni rnam 'khor rnal 'byor pa //

analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa mi mthong ngo // ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang //

original: kun smra bsten pa'i gtam yang rjod par byed //
analyzed: kun smra bsten pa'i gtam yang rjod par byed //

original: lam yang ma bshad 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: lam yang ma bshad 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin //

original: rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad //

original: he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag /
analyzed: he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag /

original: sku kun brtan g-yo bdag nyid can //
analyzed: sku kun brtan g-yo bdag nyid can //
translated: are all bodies, having the nature of the animate and inanimate.

original: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
analyzed: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //

analyzed: de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med // zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya //

original: nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba //
analyzed: nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba //

original: 'dun pa mngon du gyur pa nyid //
analyzed: 'dun pa mngon du gyur pa nyid //

original: nye ba'i 'dun pa sbyang dka' ba //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'dun pa sbyang dka' ba //

original: 'dus pa ring du song ba yin //
analyzed: 'dus pa ring du song ba yin //

original: nye bar 'dus pa mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: nye bar 'dus pa mi g-yo ba //

original: dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid //
analyzed: dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid //

original: nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin //
analyzed: nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin //

analyzed: shr'i he ru ka'i @296a *//

original: gzhung spyod ba //
analyzed: gzhung spyod ba //
translated: is the conduct of the scriptures.

original: 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid can //

original: pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni //
analyzed: pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni //

original: rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skad //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skad //

original: mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu //
analyzed: mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu //

analyzed: dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g-yo'i bdag /

original: thogs med dus su gang bstan pa //
analyzed: thogs med dus su gang bstan pa //

original: phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas //
analyzed: phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas //

original: dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che //
analyzed: dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che //

analyzed: 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso; ;kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing //

analyzed: kun tu mig dang mgo bo'i zhal //

analyzed: kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na //

original: thams cad g-yogs te rnam par bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad g-yogs te rnam par bzhugs //

original: de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba //
analyzed: de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba //

analyzed: bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te //

original: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir //

original: gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin //
translated: The secret thatness is taught.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Next, I will explain

original: man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste //
analyzed: man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste //
translated: The intimate instruction that is very difficult to acquire.

original: dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni //
translated: In the language of the symbolic signs of the hero,

original: nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin //
analyzed: nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin //
translated: I have concealed it in the tantra.

original: gos ni phyag rgya lnga la sogs //
analyzed: gos ni phyag rgya lnga la sogs //
translated: The cloth is the five symbolic ornaments, and so on.

original: shes rab yan lag phur bu dra //
analyzed: shes rab yan lag phur bu dra //
translated: The wisdom limb is the five stakes.

original: a'a li k'a li zhes brjod pa /
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zhes brjod pa /
translated: What is called “the ālikāli”

original: rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro yin //
analyzed: rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro yin //
translated: Is the preliminary of the emptiness of cause, and so on.

original: 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas //
analyzed: 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas //
translated: The engagement is with sound and so forth,

original: ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid //
analyzed: ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid //
translated: And is endowed with the union of the aggregates.

original: bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das //
translated: The nectar satisfies, and there is nirvana.

original: lag pa'i mchod pas dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: lag pa'i mchod pas dbang bskur ba //
translated: The empowerment is with the worship of the hands.

original: go cha chen pos yang dag bsrung //
analyzed: go cha chen pos yang dag bsrung //
translated: The great armor is the true protection.

original: sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa yin //
analyzed: sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa yin //
translated: It is the worship with all mantras.

original: de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni //
analyzed: de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni //
translated: Thus, these fourteen realities

original: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin //
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin //
translated: Are explained in brief.

original: mi @296b mchog gang zhig kun spyed pa //
analyzed: mi @296b mchog gang zhig kun spyed pa //
translated: The person who practices all of them

original: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag /
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag /
translated: Is the self that is pure of all evil.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing //
translated: He attains the stage of the Tathagata

original: skye dang dga' bar bde gshegs kyi //
analyzed: skye dang dga' bar bde gshegs kyi //
translated: And is born in the lineage of the Sugata.🔽He becomes a Dharma king,

original: rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur; ;de ltar cha ga ldan rgyas na //
analyzed: rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur; ;de ltar cha ga ldan rgyas na //
translated: And thus, being endowed with the seal,

original: dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol //
translated: He is granted all powers.

original: zla ba nya la sa steng du //
analyzed: zla ba nya la sa steng du //
translated: On the full moon day, on the earth,

original: 'di ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na //
translated: Thus, the yogi meditates,

original: de yi bsod nams gyur pa yin //
analyzed: de yi bsod nams gyur pa yin //
translated: And that is his merit.

original: lha klu mi la sogs pa kun //
analyzed: lha klu mi la sogs pa kun //
translated: All gods, nagas, humans, and so forth,

original: de yi bsod nams gang gyur des //
analyzed: de yi bsod nams gang gyur des //
translated: By whatever merit he has,

original: bdag gzhan yang dag ye shes ldan //
analyzed: bdag gzhan yang dag ye shes ldan //
translated: And the perfect pristine consciousness of self and other.

original: bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam //
analyzed: bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam //
translated: Through the mere thought of concentration,

original: klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis //
analyzed: klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis //
translated: Or through reading, reciting, or writing,

original: mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba'am //
analyzed: mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba'am //
translated: One will attain the enjoyments of the higher realms

original: yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob //
analyzed: yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob //
translated: Or else, one will attain a universal monarch.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe //
translated: When the yoginīs are transferred,

original: dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs mkha' 'gro //
analyzed: dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs mkha' 'gro //
translated: The glorious herukas and so on

original: lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs //
analyzed: lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs //
translated: Hold various flowers in their hands🔽And various parasols, victory banners, and flags,🔽And with various musical sounds and songs,

original: rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs glu yis mchod pas mchod //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs glu yis mchod pas mchod //
translated: They make offerings with various offerings.

original: 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di //
analyzed: 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di //
translated: This concept called “death”

original: mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su 'khyer //
analyzed: mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su 'khyer //
translated: Is carried to the place of the sky-farers.

original: de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Such a glorious great yogin

original: sa steng du ni rnyed par dka'//
analyzed: sa steng du ni rnyed par dka'//
translated: Is difficult to find on the face of the earth.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: From the Tantra of the Supreme Secret of the Great Supreme One,

original: gsang ba'i yi ge bskyed cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o ////
analyzed: gsang ba'i yi ge bskyed cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o ////
translated: The chapter on the secret syllables, the generation and accomplishment, is the sixty-sixth.
